locations.name: Harolds Chicken Shack
locations.address: 612 S Wabash Ave, Chicago, IL 60605, USA
reviews: Food was amazing. The host taking my order was extremely polite and sweet as she could be.  It was a little slow to get but worth the wait.  Only critique I have is it smelled a little like a nursing home inside.  But the food was fantastic.

Mac and cheese chicken bowl was terrible. No flavor, pasta was hard and they melted some mozzarella cheese (at least I think) on top. Also, the wings too salty. Haroldโs in name only and not quality of food. Need to eliminate some of the menu to focus more on the quality of food. Took chicken nuggets out of bowl but they were not good either.
This location seems to be better than the other ones iโve visited. I picked up my order and it was the best while eaten hot! The flavor was there and the chicken was decent. Will visit again!

They used to be good now they are nasty. My mom called about her food which was still warm btw since the large Mexican girl wanted to think it was cold. That catfish crumbled up like dust!!! My shrimp was overcooked and she didnโt want to give me a refund but gave a refund on the fish. No I brought back everything but itโs ok Iโll try to corporate number but Iโll dispute with my bank. Shorty thatโs more money in my pockets when I call my bank

I used to be a regular here in the mid 80โs when I lived in Hyde Park. Loved the hot chicken with fries and hot sauce poured all over the chicken and fries. Brought back great memories 40 years later to see it was still here and same great taste.

Siempre voy a este restaurante a comer y las empleadas me hablan en espaรฑol y hoy decidรญ llamar para ordenar y luego pasar a recoger mi comida y la persona que contestรณ muy groseramente me dijo en inglรฉs no hablo espaรฑol que falta de humildad y poco sociable con los clientes
Todo bien

Es pollo frito, un poco salado para mi gusto, hay pasteles de postre.
Muy amables y bilingรผes.

La comida estuvo increรญble. La anfitriona que tomรณ mi pedido fue sumamente amable y amable. Tardaron un poco en servirme, pero valiรณ la pena la espera. Mi รบnica crรญtica es que olรญa un poco a residencia de ancianos. Pero la comida estuvo fantรกstica.

El tazรณn de pollo con macarrones con queso estaba fatal. Sin sabor, la pasta estaba dura y le pusieron mozzarella derretida (al menos eso creo) encima. Ademรกs, las alitas estaban demasiado saladas. Harold's solo de nombre, no de calidad. Deberรญan eliminar algunas cosas del menรบ para priorizar la calidad de la comida. Sacaron los nuggets de pollo del tazรณn, pero tampoco estaban buenos.

Napakasarap ng pagkain. Napakagalang at napakabait ng host na kumuha ng order ko. Medyo mabagal ang pagdating pero sulit ang paghihintay. Ang tanging kritisismo ko lang ay medyo amoy nursing home ito sa loob. Pero napakasarap ng pagkain.

Ang Mac and cheese chicken bowl ay hindi maganda. Walang lasa, matigas ang pasta at may tinunaw na mozzarella cheese (sa tingin ko) sa ibabaw. Pati na rin, masyadong maalat ang mga pakpak. Harold's sa pangalan lamang at hindi sa kalidad ng pagkain. Kailangang alisin ang ilan sa menu para mas makapag-pokus sa kalidad ng pagkain. Tinanggal ko ang chicken nuggets sa bowl pero hindi rin masarap.
Mukhang mas maganda ang lokasyong ito kaysa sa mga napuntahan ko na. Kinuha ko ang order ko at ito ang pinakamasarap habang mainit! Naroon ang lasa at disente ang manok. Bibisita ulit ako!

Dati masarap ang mga ito ngayon ay pangit na. Tumawag ang nanay ko tungkol sa pagkain niya na mainit pa rin dahil gusto ng malaking babaeng Mehikano na isipin na malamig. Nadurog na parang alikabok ang hito!!! Nasobrahan sa luto ang hipon ko at ayaw niya akong bigyan ng refund pero ibinalik niya ang bayad sa isda. Hindi, ibinalik ko lahat pero ayos lang. Susubukan kong gamitin ang corporate number pero makikipagtalo ako sa bangko ko. Short, mas malaki ang pera ko kapag tumawag ako sa bangko ko.

Regular ako dati dito noong mid 80's noong nakatira ako sa Hyde Park. Gustung-gusto ang mainit na manok na may fries at mainit na sarsa na ibinuhos sa buong manok at fries. Ibinalik ang magagandang alaala pagkalipas ng 40 taon upang makitang narito pa rin ito at parehong mahusay na panlasa.

locations.name: Harold's Chicken Shack West Loop
locations.address: 1501 W Madison St, Chicago, IL 60607, USA
reviews: I can never leave home without stopping at Haroldโs.The food tastes just like I remember growing up. I got a perch and wing meal with mild sauce and then a 6 piece wing for the next day. It was busy due to it being the night before Christmas. Ordered before I got there and everything was hot and ready. If only there was a location near me ๐ฉ Everything was outstanding.

Ordered my food online and it was ready at the given time. There is plenty of paid street parking but if you run in and run out you can probably avoid having to pay. The cashier greeted me and he was pleasant. My order was correct. The fries and chicken were piping hot, fried correctly, and fresh.

I hadn't ate Harolds in maybe 5 years before today. I just think there are better options for the price. $10 for 4 wings and fries is a bit much to not be perfect. The chicken was hot and fresh but lacked flavor. The only seasoning I tasted was the salt and pepper I requested.

Would I eat it again? Yes. But it will probably be another 5 years.

I ordered 6 wings (mild sauce on side + hot pepper) via Uber Eats and this is what was delivered to me. 5 tiny wings and a handful of fries. For $30 on the app (I get fees and all). But what a disappointment! Please do better!

The restaurant is good for a snack. There is a big menu but unfortunately they only had fries as sides available (maybe because we joined for only lunch).
The wings with its mild sauce was very good.

This place is extremely famous for their chicken and we were quite happy with the food! We tried their shrimp, chicken tenders, wings, green tomatoes and hush-puppies. Everything tasted good even if the mild sauce was a little too mild, adding little taste. It is possible to park in the from of the restaurant and the area looked okay. If you are in the area you should give it a try!
El peor restaurante mucho tiempo de espera
SExcelente las alas de pollo riquรญsima
Excelente pollo frito!!

Hindi ako makakaalis ng bahay nang hindi pumupunta sa Harold's. Ang sarap ng pagkain ay katulad ng natatandaan ko noong bata pa ako. Bumili ako ng perch at wing meal na may mild sauce at pagkatapos ay isang 6 piece wing para sa susunod na araw. Maraming tao doon dahil gabi bago mag-Pasko. Umorder ako bago ako dumating at mainit at handa na ang lahat. Sana lang may malapit na lugar sa akin ๐ฉ Lahat ay napakasarap.

Nag-order ng aking pagkain online at handa na ito sa ibinigay na oras. Maraming bayad na paradahan sa kalye ngunit kung tatakbo ka at maubusan ay malamang na maiiwasan mong magbayad. Binati ako ng cashier at mabait naman siya. Tama ang order ko. Ang mga fries at manok ay mainit-init, pinirito nang tama, at sariwa.

Hindi ko pa nakakain si Harolds in maybe 5 years before today. Sa tingin ko lang may mga mas mahusay na pagpipilian para sa presyo. $10 para sa 4 na pakpak at fries ay medyo marami para hindi perpekto. Ang manok ay mainit at sariwa ngunit walang lasa. Ang natikman ko lang ay ang asin at paminta na hiniling ko.

Kakainin ko ba ulit? Oo. Pero 5 years pa siguro.

Umorder ako ng 6 na pakpak (banayad na sarsa sa gilid + maanghang na sili) gamit ang Uber Eats at ito ang ipinahatid sa akin. 5 maliliit na pakpak at isang dakot na fries. Sa halagang $30 sa app (may bayad ako at lahat). Pero nakakadismaya! Sana pagbutihin pa natin!

Ang restawran ay mabuti para sa meryenda. Malaki ang menu but unfortunately fries lang ang meron sila as sides available (siguro kasi lunch lang kami sumali).
Ang mga pakpak na may banayad na sarsa ay napakasarap.

Ang lugar na ito ay lubhang sikat para sa kanilang manok at kami ay lubos na nasiyahan sa pagkain! Sinubukan namin ang kanilang hipon, manok, pakpak, berdeng kamatis at hush-puppies. Masarap ang lahat kahit na ang mild sauce ay medyo masyadong mild, nagdaragdag ng kaunting lasa. Posibleng mag-park sa mula sa restaurant at mukhang okay ang lugar. Kung ikaw ay nasa lugar dapat mong subukan ito!

locations.name: Harold's Chicken Shack
locations.address: 2132 S Michigan Ave, Chicago, IL 60616, USA
reviews: I ordered  gizzard and Wings, the wings  was great but the gizzard was if they were out the freezer microwave them fried ti add batter which might understand the wait after it was a phone order first. I tried to call but no answer and the voicemail is full. I like to have the business correct any mistakes first before I post a comment. Also a coworker on the same ordered Livers was so dark as if dark grease was used. FYI, if gizzards are not popular delete them from your menu! I would've order fish & wing.

Food is amazing, service is super slow. The ladies behind the counter have no sense of urgency, not a care in the world. Waited over an hour, as people kept coming in she would tell them that the wait is only 20 minutes. She would ask customers to speak up when ordering, but when she called the numbers she would whisper.  Management needs to do better.

It was about a 40 minute wait for my food which is understandable because it was after a bears game. I didnโt expect too much coming into this restaurant but man I was blown away by those chicken wings and mild sauce. Some of the best chicken wings Iโve ever had. Fries were a little bland and didnโt have salt which maybe you couldโve asked for some but they put sauce on them too which made them better. Overall a great experience and Iโd definitely eat here again.

My order is always the same, but today, I tried something different. 6 Wings, salt, pepper, and lemon pepper. Mild sauce on the side. This was more expensive than my typical 6 Wings, salt, pepper, lemon pepper and mild sauce. I stated just put the sauce on the chicken. I waited 30 minutes for my order. I got home and there wasnโt a drop of mild sauce on my chicken! But, I was charged for it. Iโm disappointed! Couple this with fact last my order was mixed up with someone elseโs order and was fried hard with pepper juice on it. The wait time, unpleasant attitudes, and order mishaps always ruin this experience for me. They collect your receipt to redeem your food which would make it difficult to resolve the issue once youโve walked out the restaurant.

๐ฃ๏ธTRASHHHHHHHHH!

Went there to get a lemon pepper fried hard wing dinner  and salt and pepper wing dinner- started eating the chicken and saw that it was still raw on the inside- no lemon pepper in sight - no fried hard. I took it right back and  told them to look at it. Instead of them delivering good customer service and remaking  the order - they made me wait 30 mins while they made every new customer order - when I asked how much longer on the order the young woman at the woman caught an attitude.   I simply wanted to know much longer I needed to wait for a remake. 10 minutes after thisโฆ. Then- Some crip keeper man come out the back talking about - โwe not gon service you no mo-โ at this point I just want my money back- so now we have to have a debate about that. Terrible customer service and they never know who they are servicing ๐. I had to tell the lady calm down at the window, stop yelling and give me money back- a whole hour+ from the initial order to returning it  to finally getting my refund. I had to go to the one on Wabash and Harrison just so I could get my kid her wings and fries. Horrible!!!

Nag-order ako ng gizzard at Wings, ang ganda ng wings pero ang gizzard ay kung wala sila sa freezer microwave, pinirito sila at magdagdag ng batter na maaaring maunawaan ang paghihintay pagkatapos na ito ay isang order sa telepono. Sinubukan kong tawagan pero walang sumasagot at puno ang voicemail. Gusto kong itama muna sa negosyo ang anumang pagkakamali bago ako mag-post ng komento. Gayundin ang isang katrabaho sa parehong inutusan na si Lives ay napakaitim na parang dark grease ang ginamit. FYI, kung hindi sikat ang mga gizzards tanggalin ang mga ito sa iyong menu! O-order sana ako ng fish & wing.

Kahanga-hanga ang pagkain, napakabagal ng serbisyo. Ang mga babae sa likod ng counter ay walang pakiramdam ng pangangailangan ng madaliang pagkilos, walang pagmamalasakit sa mundo. Naghintay ng mahigit isang oras, habang patuloy na pumapasok ang mga tao, sasabihin niya sa kanila na 20 minuto lang ang paghihintay. Hihilingin niya sa mga customer na magsalita kapag nag-order, ngunit kapag tinawag niya ang mga numero ay bubulong siya.  Ang pamamahala ay kailangang gumawa ng mas mahusay.

Mga 40 minutong paghihintay para sa aking pagkain na maliwanag dahil ito ay pagkatapos ng laro ng mga oso. I didn't expect too much coming into this restaurant but man I was blown away by those chicken wings and mild sauce. Ang ilan sa mga pinakamahusay na pakpak ng manok na mayroon ako. Ang mga fries ay medyo mura at walang asin na marahil ay maaari mong hilingin ngunit nilagyan din sila ng sauce na nagpaganda sa kanila. Sa pangkalahatan, isang mahusay na karanasan at tiyak na kakain ako muli dito.

Laging pareho ang order ko, pero ngayon, iba ang sinubukan ko. 6 Mga pakpak, asin, paminta, at lemon pepper. Mild sauce sa gilid. Ito ay mas mahal kaysa sa aking karaniwang 6 Wings, asin, paminta, lemon pepper at mild sauce. I stated lagyan lang ng sauce yung chicken. Naghintay ako ng 30 minutes para sa order ko. Nakauwi ako at walang ni isang patak ng mild sauce sa manok ko! Ngunit, sinisingil ako para dito. nabigo ako! Couple this with fact last my order was mixed up with someone else's order and was fried hard with pepper juice on it. Ang oras ng paghihintay, hindi kasiya-siyang mga saloobin, at mga aksidente sa pagkakasunud-sunod ay palaging sumisira sa karanasang ito para sa akin. Kinokolekta nila ang iyong resibo para i-redeem ang iyong pagkain na magpapahirap sa pagresolba sa isyu kapag lumabas ka na sa restaurant.

๐ฃ๏ธTRASHHHHHHHHH!

Nagpunta doon para kumuha ng lemon pepper fried hard wing dinner at salt and pepper wing dinner- nagsimulang kainin ang manok at nakitang hilaw pa ito sa loob- walang lemon pepper sa paningin - walang pinirito nang husto. Binawi ko agad iyon at sinabihan silang tingnan ito. Sa halip na maghatid sila ng mahusay na serbisyo sa customer at muling gumawa ng order - pinahintay nila ako ng 30 minuto habang ginagawa nila ang bawat bagong order ng customer - nang tanungin ko kung gaano katagal sa order ang batang babae sa babae ay nakakuha ng saloobin.   Gusto ko lang malaman nang mas matagal na kailangan kong maghintay para sa isang muling paggawa. 10 minuto pagkatapos nitoโฆ. Then- May lumabas na crip keeper man sa likod at pinag-uusapan - โwe not gon service you no mo-โ sa puntong ito gusto ko lang ibalik ang pera ko- kaya ngayon kailangan nating magkaroon ng debate tungkol diyan. Grabe ang customer service at hindi nila alam kung sino ang kanilang sineserbisyuhan ๐. Kinailangan kong sabihin sa babae na huminahon sa bintana, huminto sa pagsigaw at ibalik sa akin ang pera- isang buong oras+ mula sa unang utos hanggang sa ibalik ito hanggang sa tuluyang makuha ang aking refund. Kailangan kong pumunta sa isa sa Wabash at Harrison para lang makuha ko ang aking anak ng kanyang mga pakpak at fries. Grabe!!!

locations.name: Harold's Chicken #55
locations.address: 129 W 87th St, Chicago, IL 60620, USA
reviews:
You can never visit Chicago without stopping at a Haroldโs Chicken! This Express location is mainly takeout.  Seating is available, but itโs mostly for waiting for your order.

Once I looked over the menu, I was ready to order. Iโll be honest, the ordering process was a little awkward at first. It was hard to tell if the cashier was ready, and I got a very faint โmay I help you.โ I placed my order, and there was no response at first, which made me laugh a little. After a short pause, she entered the order. When I asked a question about a few of the menu items, the response was very brief. Not the warmest interaction, but hey, I was there for the food.

And the food absolutely delivered!  We ordered a 10-piece wing dinner with fries, catfish dinner with fries, and fried okra. Each order came with their signature white bread and โminiโ Cole slaw.

Everything came out hot, fresh, and cooked just right. Nothing was overcooked, the seasoning was on point, and the sauce was perfect, not too thick and not too thin.

โMmm deliciousโ is truly an understatement. Despite the minimal customer service, the food quality alone makes this spot worth it. I highly recommend this restaurant if you want classic Haroldโs flavor done right.

We stopped here for early lunch.
Ordered 2-7 pc chicken wing dinners with mild sauce.
Food was up in a matter of about 20-25 minutes. Presentation was totally inviting. Yummy hot golden wings / fries with just the right amount of sauce. (drenched)
Wings were crunchy and juicy.
The fries were perfect. Oh let's not leave out that hidden slice of bread that was at the bottom covered in that special Harold's secret sauce. Entire meal was chef's kiss of carry out.  Simply delicious.

I've heard that this is the best location. I tend to agree.

I have been searching for a good Haroldโs since the location on 14th and Michigan closed down. Before trying any restaurant, l always read the reviews.  Despite the 3.9 rating, I decided to give this location a try and I was highly impressed! I went around 6pm on New Yearโs Eve and baby it was CROWDED,  so I knew the food was going to be HOT & FRESH!!  AND IT WAS!!! I ordered 4 wings fried hard with mild sauce and black pepper.  The wings were crispy and tasted so clean - no funny aftertaste. The fries were cooked to perfection. Their mild sauce was good, not too tart or sweet. My wait time was roughly 30 minutes which wasnโt bad at all considering the day. The cashier and other staff were pleasant - nobody had a stank attitude. Overall, my experience was AWESOMEโญ๏ธโญ๏ธโญ๏ธโญ๏ธโญ๏ธ
This is definitely my new go-to Haroldโs!!!๐๐ฝ๐๐ฝ๐ฃ๏ธSPREAD THE WORD!!!

Iโm a truck driver who works out of Chicago and I was bobtailing and I decided hey, itโs right off the freeway, why not stop here to grab something to eat. I loved it. Chicken was hot and fresh. My only regret was not getting extra mild sauce. Iโd come back.

Sorry about the pic quality but still. it was good.

This came from an Uber Eats order today, and the chicken is old and smelly. Itโs supposed to be for my toddler. I wouldnโt give this to a dog.
Updated response: This review was meant for #55 express, and not this location #55. However, if the owner is the same, they need a lot on the other side of the expressway because the meal was unacceptable.

En este lugar fui a agarrar รณrdenes los trabajadores de ahรญ me dijeron que no era el lugar a donde yo estaba que era la puerta que seguรญa salรญ a afuera me fijรฉ una y otra es estaba en el lugar correcto no checaban mi oren solo negaban que ese restaurante no era

ยกNunca puedes visitar Chicago sin pasar por un Harold's Chicken! Este local Express ofrece principalmente comida para llevar. Hay mesas disponibles, pero principalmente para esperar tu pedido.

Una vez que revisรฉ el menรบ, estaba lista para pedir. Siendo honesta, el proceso fue un poco incรณmodo al principio. Era difรญcil saber si la cajera estaba lista, y recibรญ un leve "ยฟen quรฉ puedo ayudarle?". Hice mi pedido y no obtuve respuesta al principio, lo que me hizo reรญr un poco. Tras una breve pausa, la cajera lo registrรณ. Cuando preguntรฉ sobre algunos platos del menรบ, la respuesta fue muy breve. No fue la interacciรณn mรกs cรกlida, pero bueno, estaba allรญ por la comida.

ยกY la comida fue un รฉxito! Pedimos una cena de 10 alitas con papas fritas, una cena de bagre con papas fritas y okra frita. Cada pedido venรญa con su pan blanco de la casa y una mini ensalada de col.

Todo estaba caliente, fresco y en su punto. Nada estaba demasiado cocido, la sazรณn estaba en su punto y la salsa estaba perfecta, ni muy espesa ni muy lรญquida.

"Mmm, ยกquรฉ rico!" se queda corto. A pesar del escaso servicio al cliente, la calidad de la comida por sรญ sola hace que valga la pena. Recomiendo ampliamente este restaurante si buscas el clรกsico sabor de Harold's en su punto.

Paramos aquรญ para almorzar temprano.
Pedimos de 2 a 7 alitas de pollo con salsa suave.
La comida llegรณ en unos 20-25 minutos. La presentaciรณn fue muy atractiva. Unas alitas y papas fritas doradas y calientes, deliciosas, con la salsa justa. (Baรฑadas).
Las alitas estaban crujientes y jugosas.
Las papas fritas estaban perfectas. Ah, y no olvidemos esa rebanada de pan escondida en el fondo, cubierta con la salsa secreta especial de Harold. Toda la comida fue un regalo del chef para llevar. Simplemente deliciosa.

He oรญdo que este es el mejor lugar. Estoy de acuerdo.

He estado buscando un buen Harold's desde que cerrรณ el de la calle 14 y Michigan. Antes de probar cualquier restaurante, siempre leo las reseรฑas. A pesar de la calificaciรณn de 3.9, decidรญ probar este lugar y ยกquedรฉ muy impresionado! Fui alrededor de las 6 p. m. en Nochevieja y estaba a reventar, asรญ que sabรญa que la comida iba a estar CALIENTE Y FRESCA. ยกY ASร LO FUE! Pedรญ cuatro alitas fritas con salsa suave y pimienta negra. Las alitas estaban crujientes y sabรญan muy limpias, sin regusto extraรฑo. Las papas fritas estaban cocinadas a la perfecciรณn. Su salsa suave estaba buena, ni demasiado รกcida ni demasiado dulce. Mi tiempo de espera fue de aproximadamente 30 minutos, lo cual no estuvo nada mal considerando el dรญa. El cajero y el resto del personal fueron amables; nadie tenรญa una actitud desagradable. En general, mi experiencia fue INCREรBLEโญ๏ธโญ๏ธโญ๏ธโญ๏ธโญ๏ธ

Soy camionero y trabajo en Chicago. Estaba conduciendo un camiรณn pequeรฑo y pensรฉ: "Oye, estรก justo al lado de la autopista, ยฟpor quรฉ no paras aquรญ a comer algo?". Me encantรณ. El pollo estaba caliente y fresco. Lo รบnico que lamento es no haber pedido salsa extra suave. Volverรญa.

Disculpen la calidad de la foto, pero aun asรญ, estaba buena.

Hindi ka makakapunta sa Chicago nang hindi pumupunta sa Harold's Chicken! Ang Express location na ito ay pangunahing takeout. May mga upuan, pero kadalasan ay para sa paghihintay ng order mo.

Nang tiningnan ko ang menu, handa na akong umorder. Sa totoo lang, medyo awkward ang proseso ng pag-order noong una. Mahirap malaman kung handa na ang cashier, at nakatanggap ako ng mahinang "maaari ba kitang tulungan?" Nag-order ako, at walang sumagot noong una, na medyo natawa ako. Pagkatapos ng maikling paghinto, ipinasok niya ang order. Nang magtanong ako tungkol sa ilan sa mga item sa menu, napakaikli ng tugon. Hindi ito ang pinakamainit na pakikipag-ugnayan, pero hey, naroon ako para sa pagkain.

At talagang na-deliver ang pagkain! Umorder kami ng 10-piece wing dinner na may fries, hito na may fries, at pritong okra. Bawat order ay may kasamang signature white bread at "mini" Cole slaw.

Lahat ay lumabas na mainit, sariwa, at tamang-tama ang luto. Walang nasobrahan sa luto, sarap na sarap ang timpla, at perpekto ang sarsa, hindi masyadong malapot at hindi rin masyadong malabnaw.

Ang "Mmm masarap" ay talagang kulang. Sa kabila ng kaunting serbisyo sa customer, sulit na sulit ang lugar na ito dahil sa kalidad ng pagkain. Lubos kong inirerekomenda ang restaurant na ito kung gusto mo ng klasikong lasa ng Harold's.

Huminto kami dito para sa maagang tanghalian.
Nag-order ng 2-7 pc chicken wing dinner na may mild sauce.
Naubos ang pagkain sa loob ng halos 20-25 minuto. Ang pagtatanghal ay lubos na kaakit-akit. Masarap na hot golden wings / fries na may tamang dami ng sauce. (basang-basa)
Ang mga pakpak ay malutong at makatas.
Ang mga fries ay perpekto. Naku huwag nating iwanan ang nakatagong hiwa ng tinapay na nasa ilalim na natatakpan ng espesyal na sikretong sarsa ni Harold. Buong pagkain ay halik ni chef ng carry out.  Simple lang masarap.

Narinig ko na ito ang pinakamagandang lokasyon. Ako ay madalas na sumang-ayon.

Matagal na akong naghahanap ng magandang Harold's simula nang magsara ang lokasyon sa 14th at Michigan. Bago ako sumubok ng kahit anong restaurant, lagi akong nagbabasa ng mga review. Sa kabila ng 3.9 rating, napagdesisyunan kong subukan ang lokasyong ito at humanga ako nang husto! Pumunta ako bandang 6pm noong Bisperas ng Bagong Taon at napakasikip talaga, kaya alam kong ang pagkain ay magiging MAINIT AT SARIWA!! AT GAYON NGA!!! Umorder ako ng 4 na pakpak na prito na may banayad na sarsa at black pepper. Malutong ang mga pakpak at napakalinis ng lasa - walang kakaibang aftertaste. Perpekto ang pagkaluto ng fries. Masarap ang kanilang banayad na sarsa, hindi masyadong maasim o matamis. Ang oras ng paghihintay ko ay humigit-kumulang 30 minuto na hindi naman masama kung isasaalang-alang ang araw na iyon. Mabait ang cashier at iba pang staff - walang mabahong ugali. Sa pangkalahatan, ang aking karanasan ay KAhanga-hangaโญ๏ธโญ๏ธโญ๏ธโญ๏ธโญ๏ธ
Ito talaga ang bago kong pinupuntahang Harold's!!!๐๐ฝ๐๐ฝ๐ฃ๏ธIKALAT ANG SALITA!!!

Isa akong tsuper ng trak na nagtatrabaho sa labas ng Chicago at nagbobtail ako at nagpasya akong hey, malapit lang ito sa freeway, bakit hindi huminto dito para kumuha ng makakain. Nagustuhan ko ito. Mainit at sariwa ang manok. Ang tanging pinagsisisihan ko ay hindi nakakakuha ng extra mild sauce. babalik sana ako.

Sorry sa pic quality but still. ito ay mabuti.

Galing ito sa isang order ng Uber Eats ngayon, at ang manok ay matanda na at mabaho. Para sa anak ko sana ito. Hindi ko ito ibibigay sa aso.
Na-update na tugon: Ang review na ito ay para sa #55 express, at hindi sa lokasyong ito #55. Gayunpaman, kung pareho ang may-ari, kailangan nila ng marami sa kabilang panig ng expressway dahil hindi katanggap-tanggap ang pagkain.

locations.name: Harold's Chicken Shack #36 (Wicker Park)
locations.address: 1361 N Milwaukee Ave, Chicago, IL 60622, USA
reviews:
While visiting Chicago I was able to visit Haroldโs Chicken #36. I ordered it the โChicago wayโ โ salt, pepper, mild sauce. It was fresh out the fryer, which already earned it points before the first bite. I was the very first customer so the order took some time which they warned me of when I placed my order.

The chicken itself was the highlight. Super crispy on the outside โ Juicy and cooked perfectly. It was fresh and made to order.

Once you got past the outer crisp, the meat itself was a bit plain. Not bad by any means โ justโฆ lacking the flavor I'm use to. I assume this is because the sauce is the overall highlight.

Now letโs talk about that mild sauce. I know itโs a Chicago tradition and a Haroldโs signature, but it didnโt really do it for me. It had a slightly sweet, tomato-forward taste that reminded me a little too much of ketchup that's diluted with vinegar. Not terrible, just not the flavor bomb I was expecting. It kind of coated everything without elevating it. I prefer MUMBO sauce wayyyyyy more.

All in all, Iโm glad I tried it. Itโs part of the culture, and the freshness and texture alone made it worth the stop. But if weโre talking strictly about flavor, it didnโt quite live up to the hype for me.

Final Verdict: Worth the experience, but not a must-have repeat.

Rating: 7.8/10

I THINK this is one of the original Haroldโs of Chicago:   THINK.

Absolutely drop dead traditional made to order only fried chicken.   Priced right, carry it out and always tip your bartenders well.

When you look beyond the exterior and the restaurant itself and just focus on the food  this place is the almost perfect place for fried chicken , the portions in comparison to the price is amazing , the tenders are HUGE and juicy and their bbq is AMAZING. And the fries are also tasty, I would eat from there over and over again. It is good to note it is a TAKE OUT place. Donโt expect to sit in.
I ask for lemon pepper I guess I got it right I mean right what do wild see. This is my first time ever in Chicago tasting this if Iโm wrong let me know

If you just care about going from hungry to full with delicious food at a fair price. This place does just that.

Ordering ahead and picking up to go is probrably the best way to get food here.

Pros: Perfectly fried and seasoned fish and chicken, generous portions. The chicken was juicy and crispy and not too heavy. Usually fried catfish is tough to get right but here it was perfectly balanced with tenderness and juicyness and crispyness.

Cons: Limited dine-in capability, fresh to order meals take at least 20min (was worth the wait).
Si quieres pollo recien preparado, te lo recomiendo, ya sea un pollo completo como solo alitas o las partes que prefieras.

Durante mi visita a Chicago, pude visitar Harold's Chicken #36. Lo pedรญ al "estilo Chicago": sal, pimienta y salsa suave. Estaba reciรฉn salido de la freidora, lo que ya le daba puntos antes del primer bocado. Fui el primer cliente, asรญ que el pedido tardรณ un poco, algo que me advirtieron al hacer el mรญo.

El pollo en sรญ era lo mรกs destacado. Supercrujiente por fuera, jugoso y cocinado a la perfecciรณn. Era fresco y hecho al momento.

Una vez que pasabas la parte crujiente, la carne en sรญ era un poco sosa. No estaba mal, ni mucho menos, solo... le faltaba el sabor al que estoy acostumbrado. Supongo que se debe a que la salsa es lo mรกs destacado.

Ahora hablemos de esa salsa suave. Sรฉ que es una tradiciรณn de Chicago y un sello distintivo de Harold's, pero no me convenciรณ. Tenรญa un sabor ligeramente dulce, con un toque a tomate, que me recordรณ demasiado al kรฉtchup diluido en vinagre. No estaba mal, pero no era la bomba de sabor que esperaba. Como que lo cubriรณ todo sin realzarlo. Prefiero muchรญsimo mรกs la salsa MUMBO.

En resumen, me alegro de haberla probado. Es parte de la cultura, y la frescura y la textura por sรญ solas hicieron que valiera la pena. Pero si hablamos estrictamente del sabor, no estuvo a la altura de las expectativas.

Veredicto final: Vale la pena la experiencia, pero no es para repetir.

Calificaciรณn: 7.8/10

Creo que este es uno de los Harold's originales de Chicago: ยกPiรฉnsenlo!

Un pollo frito tradicional, hecho al momento, ยกde risa! Tiene un precio justo, puedes pedirlo para llevar y siempre da buenas propinas a los camareros.

Cuando miras mรกs allรก del exterior y del restaurante en sรญ y solo te concentras en la comida, este lugar es casi perfecto para comer pollo frito, las porciones en comparaciรณn con el precio son increรญbles, las tiras son ENORMES y jugosas y su barbacoa es INCREรBLE. Y las patatas fritas tambiรฉn estรกn ricas, las comerรญa una y otra vez. Es bueno tener en cuenta que es un lugar para llevar. No esperes quedarte sentado.
Pido pimienta con limรณn. Creo que acertรฉ. ยฟQuรฉ ve Wild? Es la primera vez que pruebo esto en Chicago. Si me equivoco, avรญsenme.

Byล prosto z frytkownicy, co juลผ przed pierwszym kฤsem daลo mu punkty. Byลem pierwszym klientem, wiฤc zamรณwienie zajฤลo trochฤ czasu, o czym mnie poinformowano przy skลadaniu zamรณwienia.

Habang bumibisita sa Chicago, napuntahan ko ang Haroldโs Chicken #36. Inorder ko ito sa "Chicago way" โ asin, paminta, at banayad na sarsa. Bagong luto ito mula sa fryer, kaya nakakuha na ito ng puntos bago pa man ang unang subo. Ako ang pinakaunang customer kaya medyo natagalan ang order na binalaan nila ako noong nag-order ako.

Ang manok mismo ang pinakatampok. Super crispy sa labas โ Makatas at perpektong luto. Sariwa ito at ginawa ayon sa order.

Nang malagpasan mo na ang panlabas na crispy, medyo plain na ang karne mismo. Hindi naman masama โ kulang langโฆ sa lasang nakasanayan ko. Sa palagay ko ito ay dahil ang sarsa ang pangkalahatang highlight.

Ngayon, pag-usapan natin ang banayad na sarsa. Alam kong tradisyon ito ng Chicago at isang Haroldโs signature, pero hindi talaga ito ang gusto ko. Medyo matamis ito, parang kamatis ang lasa na nagpapaalala sa akin ng ketchup na hinaluan ng suka. Hindi naman masama, hindi lang ang flavor bomb na inaasahan ko. Medyo natatakpan nito ang lahat nang hindi ito tumataas. Mas gusto ko ang MUMBO sauce nang sobra.

Sa kabuuan, natutuwa akong nasubukan ko ito. Bahagi na ito ng kultura, at ang kasariwaan at tekstura pa lang ang dahilan kung bakit sulit itong subukan. Pero kung ang pag-uusapan ay puro lasa, hindi ito umabot sa inaasahan ko.

Pangwakas na Hatol: Sulit ang karanasan, pero hindi dapat ulitin.

Rating: 7.8/10

I THINK this is one of the original Harold's of Chicago: THINK.

Absolutely drop dead traditional made to order only fried chicken.   Sakto ang presyo, isagawa ito at laging tip sa iyong mga bartender.

Kapag tumingin ka sa kabila ng panlabas at ang mismong restaurant at tumutok lamang sa pagkain ang lugar na ito ay ang halos perpektong lugar para sa pritong manok, ang mga bahagi kung ihahambing sa presyo ay kamangha-manghang, ang mga malambot ay MALAKI at makatas at ang kanilang bbq ay AMAZING. At masarap din ang fries, paulit-ulit akong kakain mula doon. Magandang tandaan na ito ay isang TAKE OUT na lugar. Huwag asahan na maupo.
Humingi ako ng lemon pepper I guess I got it right I mean right what do wild see. Ito ang unang pagkakataon ko sa Chicago na matikman ito kung mali ako ipaalam sa akin

Kung nagmamalasakit ka lang sa pagpunta mula sa gutom hanggang sa busog sa masasarap na pagkain sa isang patas na presyo. Iyon lang ang ginagawa ng lugar na ito.

Ang pag-order nang maaga at pag-pick up para pumunta ay marahil ang pinakamahusay na paraan upang makakuha ng pagkain dito.

Mga Pros: Perpektong pinirito at tinimplahan na isda at manok, masaganang bahagi. Ang manok ay makatas at malutong at hindi masyadong mabigat. Karaniwan ang piniritong hito ay mahirap makuha ngunit narito ito ay ganap na balanse sa lambot at makatas at malutong.

Cons: Limitado ang kakayahan sa dine-in, bago mag-order ng mga pagkain ay tumatagal ng hindi bababa sa 20min (ay sulit ang paghihintay).

reviews: Chicken is good but every time I go there I ask them did they put my coleslaw in the bag and they always lie and say they did. I open the bag in front of them EVERY TIME and itโs never in there! Why lie about that? And yall charging 50 cent for it and donโt wanna give it out.

We were in Chicago on vacation and our first stop was to Haroldโs Chicken off 35th street. James the owner was super nice.  We had gizzards, liver, cat fish, coleslaw, wings and grapes with toffee. EVERYTHING was delicious!! The grapes were surprisingly delicious. The sauce did not disappoint! Iโd recommend you check out Haroldโs Chicken on 35th street.

I love Harold's โค๏ธ My order was hot, fresh, and quick. The service was great from beginning to end. I ordered 2 6 piece wing dinners, which included fries and their famous mild sauce. It was delicious like always.

I went in and ordered two 6 wings. these people gave me a 4 wing and a 6 wing. I wouldโve been cool with it if they put the right stuff on top. The cashiers are just dumb ditzy hoโs. Then they have the nerve to not answer their phone. Horrible service and horrible food. Im blew asl. Looking at my receipt she charged me for stuff i didnโt asked for the lady was old but if sheโs too old to comprehend simple requests then she needs to be fired.

Masarap ang manok pero tuwing pumupunta ako roon, tinatanong ko sila kung inilagay ba nila ang coleslaw ko sa supot at lagi silang nagsisinungaling at sinasabing inilagay nga nila. Masarap ang manok pero basura ang fries. I donโt feel like you should re-drop French fries because they look like the picture Iโm attaching. Smh. Very disappointing kapag ang isang 6 wing ay 15$ at hindi ka makakain ng fries!!

Nasa Chicago kami noong bakasyon at ang una naming hinto ay sa Harold's Chicken sa 35th street. Si James ang may-ari ay sobrang bait.  Mayroon kaming mga gizzards, atay, isda ng pusa, coleslaw, pakpak at ubas na may toffee. LAHAT ay masarap!! Ang mga ubas ay nakakagulat na masarap. Hindi nabigo ang sarsa! Inirerekomenda kong tingnan mo ang Harold's Chicken sa ika-35 na kalye.

I love Harold's โค๏ธ Mainit, sariwa, at mabilis ang order ko. Napakaganda ng serbisyo mula simula hanggang wakas. Nag-order ako ng 2 6 piece wing dinner, na may kasamang fries at ang kanilang sikat na mild sauce. Ito ay masarap tulad ng dati.

Pumasok ako at umorder ng dalawang 6 wings. Binigyan ako ng mga taong ito ng 4 wing at 6 wing. Okay lang sana sa akin kung tamang sarsa ang nilagyan nila. Puro hot sauce ang nilagyan nila ng wings at sobrang asin at paminta. SINO BA ANG PUPUNTA SA HAROLDS AT MALAPIT LANG ANG MAINIT NA SAUCE SA MANOK NILA???? Kilala ang Harold's sa MILD SAUCE. Puro mga bobo ang mga cashier. Tapos ang lakas ng loob nilang hindi sagutin ang telepono nila. Pangit ang serbisyo at pangit ang pagkain. Nababaliw ako. Nang tingnan ko ang resibo ko, sinisingil niya ako para sa mga bagay na hindi ko naman hiniling. Matanda na ang babae, pero kung masyado na siyang matanda para umintindi ng mga simpleng kahilingan, dapat siyang tanggalin sa trabaho.

locations.address: Kimbark Plaza Parking Lot, 1208 E 53rd St, Chicago, IL 60615, USA
reviews: Great tasting chicken but, damn do the employees have to pay for sauce out of pocket? This chicken is way too dry for the price!! Also, if you ask for more sauce they force you to buy extra in a cup which is not the same and defeats the purpose of adding sauce while the food is hot! Iโm giving a 1 star because, this is not how original Haroldโs is served!

Normally I can order my food and pick it up without a problem but today when I went to pick up my order, I tried to tell one of the women, looks to be in her 40s, that I made an order and when I said my name, she ignored me and started calling numbers from 62 to 67, and then another woman walks up and said she called in an order, now another woman in the back gets her food and Iโm trying to get mine after her but the older woman just calling numbers, still ignoring me. I finally tell the younger woman I ordered through grub hub and I tell her my name like I told the other woman and she gets my food for me. I donโt know what the older ladyโs problem was but she needs to get better customer service skills or stop working the register. It doesnโt take a lot just to learn to listen  and stop ignoring people especially when theyโre not disrespectful. I wonโt be coming back here ever again.
I purchased 5 wings and they were pretty decent but the fries were hard, dry, and some what soggy. Can't eat chicken from harolds if fries not right. Places since Covid have really went down

Not going to lie I gave up on this Haroldโs years ago because the food quality and service had fallen off. But today I decided to give it another chance and ordered 15 wings. The line was long but they were moving people in and out quick. And honestlyโฆ they made a comeback. The chicken was fye, fresh, and crunchy just how I like it. Even my 5-year-old said Mama this chicken fye

I ordered a fourth white with just lemon pepper I received what looked like a fried rat with a bunch of sauce ,this Harolds has went really down and when you try to call, they donโt pick up the phone. I wouldnโt recommend this place at all.

La empleada le tratรณ con discriminaciรณn  muy mala atenciรณn  no vengo maa nunca aca
Una hora para que me den la comida

Ang sarap ng lasa ng manok pero, damn kailangan bang magbayad ng mga empleyado para sa sauce mula sa bulsa? Ang manok na ito ay masyadong tuyo para sa presyo!! At saka, kung hihingi ka pa ng sauce pinipilit ka nilang bumili ng extra sa isang cup na hindi pareho at tinatalo ang layunin ng pagdaragdag ng sauce habang mainit ang pagkain! Nagbibigay ako ng 1 star dahil, hindi ganito ang orihinal na paghahain ng Harold!

Karaniwan ay nakakapag-order ako ng pagkain at nakukuha ko ito nang walang problema. Pero ngayon, noong kukunin ko na ang order ko, sinubukan kong sabihin sa isa sa mga babae, na mukhang nasa edad 40, na may order ako. Nang sabihin ko ang pangalan ko, hindi niya ako pinansin at tinawagan ang mga numero mula 62 hanggang 67. May lumapit na isa pang babae at sinabing tinawag niya ang order. Ngayon, may isa pang babae sa likod na kumuha ng pagkain niya at sinusubukan kong kunin ang akin, pero tumatawag lang ang matandang babae ng numero, hindi pa rin ako pinapansin. Sa wakas, sinabi ko sa nakababatang babae na umorder ako gamit ang grub hub at sinabi ko sa kanya ang pangalan ko tulad ng sinabi ko sa isa pang babae at siya ang kumuha ng pagkain ko. Hindi ko alam kung ano ang problema ng matandang babae pero kailangan niyang pagbutihin ang customer service skills o tumigil na sa pagiging matino. Hindi naman kailangan ng maraming oras para lang matutong makinig at tumigil sa pagbalewala sa mga tao lalo na kung hindi naman sila masungit. Hindi na ako babalik dito.

Bumili ako ng limang pakpak at maayos naman ang mga ito pero matigas, tuyo, at medyo malabnaw ang fries. Hindi makakain ng manok mula sa Harolds kung hindi tama ang fries. Bumaba na talaga ang mga lugar simula noong Covid.

Hindi magsisinungaling, sumuko ako sa Harold na ito maraming taon na ang nakalipas dahil ang kalidad ng pagkain at serbisyo ay bumagsak. Ngunit ngayon nagpasya akong bigyan ito ng isa pang pagkakataon at nag-order ng 15 mga pakpak. Mahaba ang pila pero mabilis silang naglalabas-masok ng mga tao. At sa totoo lang... nag-comeback sila. Ang manok ay fye, sariwa, at malutong kung paano ko ito gusto. Kahit ang 5-year-old ko sabi ni Mama this chicken fye

Nag-order ako ng pang-apat na puti na may lamang lemon na paminta Nakatanggap ako ng parang piniritong daga na may isang bungkos ng sarsa, itong si Harolds ay talagang bumaba at kapag sinubukan mong tawagan, hindi nila kinuha ang telepono. Hindi ko irerekomenda ang lugar na ito.

reviews: Man ๐คฉ idk what it is about this specific Harold's Chicken location but it hits Everytime! I went bk and the was giving garbage again. It's 2025 and don't nobody have money to waste so it's safe to say that I won't be patronizing this business again.

Lalaki ๐คฉ idk kung ano ito tungkol sa partikular na lokasyon ng Harold's Chicken ngunit ito ay tumatama sa Everytime! I got the 1/2 white dinner and when I tell you every piece of chicken was fire that is exactly what I mean! Laging mahal ang kanilang pagkain at iba't-ibang. Ang tanging bagay ay pakiramdam ko ang kanilang mga pakpak ay maaaring maging masyadong mahal kumpara sa aktwal na mga hapunan dahil pakiramdam ko ay nakakakuha ka ng isang mas mahusay na halaga kapag nakuha mo ang hapunan sa ibabaw ng mga pakpak ngunit pagkatapos ay tiyak na sila ay mahusay at isang pangunahing pagkain sa Chicago ๐๐พ

Maganda ang lokasyong ito ngunit napunta sa maling direksyon! Nag-order ako ng 6 na pakpak na extra mild sauce na sinisingil sa akin para sa manok ay matigas at luma na may napakaliit na sarsa. I went bk and the was giving garbage again. 2025 na at wala bang magsasayang ng pera kaya ligtas na sabihin na hindi ko na tatangkilikin ang negosyong ito.

Ilang taon akong walang Harold's Chicken. Hindi ako taong manok pero napagod ako. Madalas akong pumunta sa lokasyong ito tulad ng mga nakaraang taon. Astig ang cashier at nasa loob ang loob. It's not finna b all brand new this is Harold's Chicken ang pinag-uusapan natin sa trenches. Naging abala iyon na inaasahan. Ang manok ay disente ngunit hindi tulad ng dati noong pumunta ako 5 taon na ang nakakaraan. Kumuha ako ng half dark fries hard with mind sauce sa gilid.
Ang paborito kong Harold!! Love their sauce so baddd , basta mag-impake sa tuwing pupunta ako ngunit sulit ito !!!

Sa tingin nila sila ang pinakamahusay na Harold sa lungsod. Kaya patuloy silang tumataas sa kanilang mga presyo at sa pagkakataong ito ay inilagay nila ang aking mild sauce sa gilid. Sabi ko salt paper at mild sauce never sinabi sa gilid! Masamang may-ari ng Negosyo at manggagawa kahit na pinakamasama!

reviews: I called my order in the cashier told me 20 mins I took 35 mins to come. I came in no line empty still waited 8 mins. That Lady attitude and her customer service is horrible, I see why I done walked in a couple of times and customers is cussing her out. Black business customer service needs to do better or go find something else!

The food is edible, but not the best. I didnโt taste much flavor and the fish pieces were thin, however, the shrimp were pretty good. The service is not up to par as well. The house sauce/ special sauce (mild) is not mind-blowing. I couldnโt finish it. And to think I was excited to eat hereโฆ.I guess I shouldโve got the chicken. Pretty pricy as well!

I try my best to support my people but my people MUST do better. We donโt owe you anything. YOU depend on us!

When I say never I mean never ever will I go to this Haroldโs. When I went to pick my order up I over heard the cashier taking an over the phone order and the customer was saying she didnโt want the bbq sauce she wanted mild, the cashier went to explain that they do not carry the โoriginalโ Haroldโs mild sauce and they only have the Haroldโs bbq sauce. While I never tasted the bbq sauce my son has and he doesnโt like it on his chicken, I say that because when picked my order up and heard the conversation, I explained I didnโt want it on my chicken. So at the bottom of my fish this is the bread I have. When I say they had to dip this bread in grease and lay it in the tray thatโs exactly what they did. I donโt care what changes a customer wants to make to their order this type of behavior is never okay. This is crazy that I paid $35 for this, as a black business itโs trashy and classless.

Tinawagan ko ang order ko sa cashier at sinabing 20 minuto lang ang lumipas, inabot ako ng 35 minuto bago dumating. Pagdating ko, walang pila, naghintay pa rin ako ng 8 minuto. Sabi niya, $5 ang french fry at may kaunting sukli, pero online, mga $3. Sabi niya, โNaku, kailangan nang i-update ng may-ari.โ Dati, ito ang paborito ko. Ang sama ng ugali ng babae at ang customer service niya, naiintindihan ko na kung bakit ilang beses na akong pumasok at minumura siya ng mga customer. Kailangang pagbutihin pa ng mga itim na negosyo ang customer service o maghanap na lang ng iba!

Gustung-gusto ko ang Harold's ngunit hindi ko alam na ang lahat ng kanilang mga sarsa ay naiiba kahit na sa lokasyong ito. Ang pagkain ay naluto nang maayos ngunit ang banayad na sarsa ay ganap na nawala at natapon ang buong pagkain. Mangyaring manatili sa orihinal na sarsa at ang paghihintay ay 20 minuto ngunit sa halip ay 35 minuto.

Ang pagkain ay nakakain, ngunit hindi ang pinakamahusay. Hindi ako masyadong nakatikim ng lasa at manipis ang mga piraso ng isda, gayunpaman, ang hipon ay medyo masarap. Ang serbisyo ay hindi rin abot-kayang. Ang sarsa ng bahay/ espesyal na sarsa (mild) ay hindi nakakagulat. hindi ko ito natapos. At isipin na nasasabik akong kumain dito....I guess I should've got the chicken. Medyo pricy din!

Ang pagkain ay masarap ngunit ang serbisyo ay HORRIBLE. Ito ay lumala sa paglipas ng mga taon. Ano ang layunin ng pagtawag kung kailangan ko pang maghintay ng isang oras para maluto ang aking pagkain?!? Then the clerk wanna get jazzy kasi tinanong ko kung gaano katagal ako maghihintay! locations.address: 6307 W 26th St, Berwyn, IL 60402, USA
reviews: The chicken was fresh and hot, the lemon pepper was delicious and of quality. The customer service was excellent ๐ and the vibe was pleasant. This place is unique and brilliant!

First time coming to a Harolds like this. I traveled 50 miles to get to a harolds as it's been over 5 years since having some. The food was so hot and fresh. The atmosphere was nice came on a Sunday during the football game. Nice crowd. Be patient as the food is made to order expect to wait 20-25 mins. Would come again.

This place is weird but in a good way. Where better to have a Harold Chicken than in a โฆcar wash/detailing center/Bar? Crazy, right?  Now the chicken. Itโs everything you expect. Delicious, hot and fresh. They make everything on demand so itโll take like 20 min for your food to cook if you are ordering for more than 1 person. They people here are super friendly and thatโs a big plus for me. Been here like 3 or 4 times now and the food never disappoints.

I ordered online and walked over to pickup.  The food was on time, hot, fresh, and delicious.  Maybe they had a rocky start? but I didn't experience any of the problems people have mentioned in other reviews.  Plenty of sauce (I ordered it on-the-side), and not greasy-- even the lone piece of white bread on the bottom of the bucket wasn't.

Will be going back.

I got a full car wash and they left it all dirty. They didnโt clean the inside at all and the outside was still dirty and wet. They spend around an hour to be done with it and they left it worse than it was. The inside was left wet with stains. My car key fob was push all the way inside and I was unable to press the lock button like if they had stepped on it. The good reviews are probably for the food and not the car wash. The trunk was not touch at all. Not worth $40.
Primera y รบltima vez que vengo a lavar mi troca a ese lugar,demasiado caro para el servicio que dan
Comida echa a la orden!!
El pollo estaba fresco y picante, el limรณn y la pimienta estaban deliciosos y de calidad. El servicio al cliente fue excelente ๐ y el ambiente era agradable. ยกEste lugar es รบnico y genial!

Es la primera vez que vengo a un Harolds como este. Viajรฉ 80 kilรณmetros para llegar, ya que hacรญa mรกs de 5 aรฑos que no iba. La comida estaba muy caliente y fresca. El ambiente era agradable. Fui un domingo durante el partido de fรบtbol. Habรญa mucha gente. Tengan paciencia, ya que la comida se prepara al momento, asรญ que esperen entre 20 y 25 minutos. Volverรญa.

Este lugar es peculiar, pero en el buen sentido. ยฟQuรฉ mejor lugar para comer un pollo Harold que en un lavadero de autos, un centro de limpieza o un bar? ยกQuรฉ locura! Y ahora, el pollo. Es justo lo que esperas. Delicioso, caliente y fresco. Preparan todo al momento, asรญ que la comida tardarรก unos 20 minutos en cocinarse si pides para mรกs de una persona. La gente aquรญ es sรบper amable, y eso es una gran ventaja para mรญ. He estado aquรญ unas 3 o 4 veces y la comida nunca decepciona.

Sariwa at maanghang ang manok, masarap at de-kalidad ang lemon pepper. Napakahusay ng customer service ๐ at kaaya-aya ang ambiance. Natatangi at napakaganda ng lugar na ito!

First time makapunta sa isang Harold na ganito. Naglakbay ako ng 50 milya upang makarating sa isang harolds dahil mahigit 5 โโtaon na ang nakalipas mula nang magkaroon ako ng ilan. Ang pagkain ay napakainit at sariwa. Ang ganda ng kapaligiran ay dumating noong Linggo sa laro ng football. Ganda ng crowd. Maging matiyaga dahil ang pagkain ay ginawa upang mag-order asahan na maghintay ng 20-25 minuto. Darating ulit.

Ang lugar na ito ay kakaiba ngunit sa isang magandang paraan. Saan mas magandang magkaroon ng Harold Chicken kaysa sa isang โฆcar wash/detailing center/Bar? Baliw diba?  Ngayon ang manok. Ito ang lahat ng iyong inaasahan. Masarap, mainit at sariwa. Ginagawa nila ang lahat nang on demand kaya aabutin ng 20 min bago maluto ang iyong pagkain kung mag-o-order ka para sa higit sa 1 tao. Ang mga tao dito ay sobrang palakaibigan at iyon ay isang malaking plus para sa akin. Nakapunta na dito tulad ng 3 o 4 na beses ngayon at ang pagkain ay hindi kailanman nabigo.

Nag-order ako online at naglakad papunta sa pickup.  Ang pagkain ay nasa oras, mainit, sariwa, at masarap.  Marahil sila ay nagkaroon ng isang mabato na simula? ngunit hindi ko naranasan ang alinman sa mga problemang binanggit ng mga tao sa ibang mga review.  Maraming sarsa (nag-order ako sa gilid), at hindi mamantika-- kahit na ang nag-iisang piraso ng puting tinapay sa ilalim ng balde ay hindi.

Babalik.

Kumuha ako ng buong paghuhugas ng kotse at iniwan nilang madumi ang lahat. Hindi nila nilinis ang loob at ang labas ay marumi at basa pa. Gumugugol sila ng humigit-kumulang isang oras upang matapos ito at iniwan nila itong mas masahol pa kaysa noon. Ang loob ay naiwang basa ng mga mantsa. Ang fob ng susi ng kotse ko ay nakatulak hanggang sa loob at hindi ko napindot ang lock button na parang natapakan nila. Ang magagandang review ay marahil para sa pagkain at hindi sa paghuhugas ng kotse. Hindi nahawakan ang baul. Hindi nagkakahalaga ng $40.

locations.name: Harold's โThe Fried Wing King โ
locations.address: 1118 W Wilson Ave, Chicago, IL 60640, USA
reviews: This is a Chicago staple. I got buy 2 get 2 free on Doordash. However, I have dined in before too.

This place is a total scam. I ordered a buy 1-get-1 chicken sandwich offer from uber eats.  They put a long piece of fried chicken (half of which was paper thin) and placed 4 buns on it. A total of 8 fries. They completely ripped me off. If they're cutting corners on their specials, what other shady stuff are they doing? Don't eat here.

They get away with the high pries because this is the Northside and the people don't know any better. You play more and get less at this location and it don't taste like Harold's for real. I ordered here off Uber Eats. Supposed to be a buy one, get one free catfish nuggets meal. Come to find out they only give you 5 nuggets and combine both orders in one tray. With only 1 order of French fries. Now I never heard of a 5 piece cat fish nugget. It's usually just large or small. The fact that you would charge that price for small pieces is crazy. I suggest people avoid this place and go out south or to the Harold's on West Howard. Better prices and taste like real Harold's.

This Haroldโs food is decent, but the problem I have is that they are flexing a proud black owned badge in the window, but the workers are Caucasian frying the chicken, yes very strange. And sheโs doing a great job, although sheโs working alone as the cashier and also the cook. So please donโt be in a hurry coming here.
Cook is very white not black the reply is a lie, also ordered wings from here 12/22/25 and the wings were not seasoned , I ordered them with out sauce on purpose so I could taste them without distraction, they were unseasoned and tasted like the oil needed to be changed
Ordered through Uber eats. Did not receive coleslaw or bread and catfish had ketchup all over it. Ketchup shouldโve been on the side. No answer when I called restaurant mailbox is full
muy buena comida, un poco viejo el establecimiento pero se come bien.
Este es un clรกsico de Chicago. Conseguรญ una oferta de 2x1 en DoorDash. Sin embargo, tambiรฉn he comido allรญ antes.

Este lugar es una estafa total. Pedรญ un sรกndwich de pollo de Uber Eats con la oferta de 1 por 1. Me pusieron un trozo largo de pollo frito (la mitad finรญsimo) y 4 panecillos encima. Un total de 8 papas fritas. Me estafaron por completo. Si estรกn recortando en sus especiales, ยฟquรฉ otras cosas turbias estรกn haciendo? No coman aquรญ.

Se salen con la suya con los altos precios porque esto es el Northside y la gente no sabe nada mejor. En este lugar juegas mรกs y obtienes menos, y no sabe a Harold's de verdad. Pedรญ aquรญ por Uber Eats. Se supone que es una compra de uno, llรฉvate otro gratis de nuggets de bagre. Resulta que solo te dan 5 nuggets y combinan ambos pedidos en una bandeja. Con solo una orden de papas fritas. Nunca habรญa oรญdo hablar de un nuggets de bagre de 5 piezas. Suelen ser grandes o pequeรฑos. El hecho de que cobren ese precio por piezas pequeรฑas es una locura. Sugiero que la gente evite este lugar y vaya al sur o al Harold's en West Howard. Mejores precios y el sabor es como el verdadero Harold's.

La comida de este Harold's es decente, pero el problema es que exhiben una orgullosa insignia de propietario negro en la ventana, pero quienes frรญen el pollo son caucรกsicos. Sรญ, es muy extraรฑo. Y estรก haciendo un gran trabajo, aunque trabaja sola como cajera y cocinera. Asรญ que, por favor, no tengan prisa.
La cocinera es muy blanca, no negra; la respuesta es mentira. Ademรกs, pedรญ alitas aquรญ el 22/12/25 y no estaban sazonadas. Las pedรญ sin salsa a propรณsito para poder probarlas sin distracciones. Estaban sin sazonar y sabรญan a que les habรญan cambiado el aceite.
To klasyk Chicago. Kupiลem 2, a 2 dostaลem gratis na Doordash. Ale ja teลผ kiedyล jadลem tam.

To miejsce to totalne oszustwo. Zamรณwiลem kanapkฤ z kurczakiem w promocji โkup 1, a dostaniesz 1โ z Uber Eats. Poลoลผyli dลugi kawaลek smaลผonego kurczaka (z ktรณrego poลowa byลa cienka jak papier) i doลoลผyli do niego 4 buลki. W sumie 8 frytek. Totalnie mnie oszukali. Skoro oszczฤdzajฤ na swoich specjaลach, to co jeszcze podejrzanego robiฤ? Nie jedzcie tam.

Uchodzi im to na sucho z wysokimi kwalifikacjami, bo to jest Northside i ludzie nie wiedzฤ nic lepszego. W tym miejscu grasz wiฤcej i dostajesz mniej, a to naprawdฤ nie smakuje jak Harold's. Zamรณwiลem tu z Uber Eats. Niby kup jeden, a drugi dostaniesz gratis. Okazaลo siฤ, ลผe dajฤ tylko 5 nuggetsรณw i ลฤczฤ oba zamรณwienia na jednej tacy. Z tylko jednฤ porcjฤ frytek. Nigdy nie sลyszaลem o 5 nuggetsach z suma. Zazwyczaj sฤ tylko duลผe lub maลe. Fakt, ลผe naliczasz takฤ cenฤ za maลe kawaลki, jest szalony. Radzฤ ludziom unikaฤ tego miejsca i iลฤ na poลudnie lub do Harold's na West Howard. Lepsze ceny i smak jak prawdziwy Harold's.

Jedzenie w tym Harold's jest niezลe, ale problem polega na tym, ลผe dumnie eksponujฤ w witrynie odznakฤ โczarny wลaลcicielโ, a pracownicy to biali, smaลผฤcy kurczaka โ tak, bardzo dziwne. I ลwietnie sobie radzi, chociaลผ pracuje sama jako kasjerka i kucharka. Wiฤc proszฤ, nie spieszcie siฤ z przychodzeniem tutaj.
Kucharka jest bardzo biaลa, a nie czarna โ odpowiedลบ jest kลamstwem. Zamรณwiลem teลผ skrzydeลka 22.12.2025 i nie byลy przyprawione. Celowo zamรณwiลem je bez sosu, ลผeby mรณc je sprรณbowaฤ bez rozpraszania uwagi. Byลy niedoprawione i smakowaลy, jakby olej wymagaล wymiany.

Ito ay isang pangunahing pagkain sa Chicago. Nakakuha ako ng buy 2 get 2 na libre sa Doordash. Gayunpaman, kumain na rin ako dati.

Scam talaga ang lugar na ito. Umorder ako ng buy 1-get-1 chicken sandwich na alok mula sa Uber Eats. Naglagay sila ng mahabang piraso ng pritong manok (kalahati nito ay manipis) at nilagyan ng apat na tinapay. Walo ang kabuuang fries. Niloko nila ako. Kung nagtitipid sila sa mga espesyal nila, ano pa ang mga kahina-hinalang ginagawa nila? Huwag kumain dito.

Lumalayo sila sa mga mataas na pari dahil ito ang Northside at hindi na alam ng mga tao. Mas marami kang maglaro at kukulangin sa lokasyong ito at hindi talaga ito lasa tulad ng kay Harold. Nag-order ako dito sa Uber Eats. Dapat ay isang bumili ng isa, kumuha ng isang libreng catfish nuggets meal. Halika upang malaman na bibigyan ka lang nila ng 5 nuggets at pagsamahin ang parehong mga order sa isang tray. Sa 1 order lang ng French fries. Ngayon wala na akong narinig na 5 pirasong cat fish nugget. Ito ay kadalasang malaki o maliit lamang. Nakakabaliw ang katotohanan na sisingilin mo ang presyong iyon para sa maliliit na piraso. Iminumungkahi kong iwasan ng mga tao ang lugar na ito at pumunta sa timog o sa Harold's sa West Howard. Mas magandang presyo at lasa tulad ng totoong Harold's.

Masarap naman ang pagkaing ito ni Harold, pero ang problema ko ay may nakadikit silang itim na badge sa bintana, pero ang mga trabahador ay mga Caucasian na nagpiprito ng manok, oo, kakaiba talaga. At mahusay ang trabaho niya, kahit mag-isa lang siyang nagtatrabaho bilang kahera at kusinero. Kaya huwag kayong magmadaling pumunta rito.
Puti ang kusinero, hindi itim, kasinungalingan ang sagot. Umorder din ako ng mga pakpak mula rito noong 12/22/25 at walang timpla ang mga pakpak. Sinadya kong umorder nang walang sarsa para matikman ko nang walang abala. Walang timpla ang mga ito at parang kailangan palitan ang mantika.

locations.name: Harold's Chicken Shack #35
locations.address: 12700 S Halsted St, Chicago, IL 60628, USA
reviews:
My first time ordering here. I went in it wasn't very crowded. I saw 3 people waiting. THE MUSIC was blasting I could barely hear the lady taking my order. Ordered 5 wings salt pepper mild on side. They call my number I showed the ticket. I was surprised the order came out quickly I didn't think nothing of it.
Got home realized They gave me 4 Wings instead of 5. Tried to call no one answered and the phone kept hanging up. I will Not come to this location again. ๐ค Bad Service and my chicken was cold. Im sure they gave me the wrong order.
Amazing chicken. They also sell deep fried catfish and they are really good. The location is a bit far from Downtown but still reachable. Must try place if you are in Chicago.

I did not enjoy my experience here. I followed the hype, from Tik Tok, and wanted to get a taste of Chicago. I ordered the 4 piece wings and fries. I threw my fries in the trash. My fries were not hot. The chicken is mediocre. Nothing that made me feel like it was good chicken. Honestly,it felt like a waste. Iโm open to trying another time and maybe another location one day.

Ordered 18 wings waited 20 minutesโฆ cool! Get the food it wasnโt hot as if they just fried itโฆ get home itโs pieces of paper in it and it looks as if they broke down orders they had that people hadnโt picked up and made me a an 18 pieceโฆ fries werenโt hot and they put so much sauce on it to try to cover up the fact that it wasnโt fresh chickenโฆ the sauce isnโt what it use to be it was kinda bitterโฆ big disappointment had to put it in the air fryer because I didnโt want to hand it back and they play with it or get a refund and go somewhere else because it wasnโt fresh chicken already after 10pmโฆ. But I will not be getting anything else from this location!!!! Theyโre supposed to have insurance for spoilage not push it off on a loyal customerโฆ.sad!!!

The food and service was great, but while I was ordering, a man that works here came in loudly yelling and cursing at the lady that was taking my order and everyone in the lobby could hear him yelling. The man in back was extremely unprofessional and abusive to the lady that was taking orders. Iโm not sure if heโs a manager, but if he is he needs to be fired immediately.  Your employees should not be subject to that kind of abuse. This happened on 12/20 around 2:45pm.
Este es el de la pelรญcula Beats.

Era la primera vez que pedรญ aquรญ. Entrรฉ y no habรญa mucha gente. Vi a tres personas esperando. La mรบsica estaba a todo volumen, apenas podรญa oรญr a la chica que me tomaba el pedido. Pedรญ cinco alitas con sal y pimienta, suaves. Me llamaron y les mostrรฉ el ticket. Me sorprendiรณ que el pedido saliera tan rรกpido, no le di importancia.

Al llegar a casa me di cuenta de que me habรญan dado cuatro alitas en lugar de cinco. Intentรฉ llamar, pero nadie contestรณ y el telรฉfono seguรญa colgando. No volverรฉ a este lugar. ๐ค Mal servicio y mi pollo estaba frรญo. Seguro que me dieron el pedido equivocado.
Pollo increรญble. Tambiรฉn venden bagre frito y estรก buenรญsimo. Estรก un poco lejos del centro, pero es accesible. Si estรกs en Chicago, tienes que probarlo.

No disfrutรฉ mi experiencia aquรญ. Seguรญ la publicidad de TikTok y querรญa probar Chicago. Pedรญ las alitas de 4 piezas y las papas fritas. Tirรฉ las papas a la basura. No estaban picantes. El pollo es mediocre. Nada que me hiciera sentir como si fuera un buen pollo. Sinceramente, me sentรญ desperdiciado. Estoy abierto a probar otra vez y quizรกs a otro lugar algรบn dรญa.

Pedรญ 18 alitas y esperรฉ 20 minutos... ยกgenial! Me trajeron la comida, no estaba caliente, como si la hubieran frito reciรฉn hecha... al llegar a casa, tenรญa trozos de papel dentro y parecรญa que habรญan desglosado los pedidos que tenรญan y que la gente no habรญa recogido, y me hicieron una de 18 piezas... las papas fritas no estaban calientes y le pusieron muchรญsima salsa para intentar disimular que no era pollo fresco... la salsa ya no es lo que era, estaba un poco amarga... gran decepciรณn, tuve que ponerla en la freidora de aire porque no querรญa devolverla y que jugaran con ella o que me devolvieran el dinero y se fueran a otro sitio porque ya no era pollo fresco despuรฉs de las 10 de la noche... ยกยกยกPero no volverรฉ a pedir nada mรกs en este sitio!!! Se supone que tienen seguro por deterioro, no que se lo pasen a un cliente fiel... ยกยกยกtriste!!!

First time kong mag-order dito. Pumasok ako hindi naman masyadong crowded. May nakita akong 3 tao na naghihintay. Pumutok ang musika halos hindi ko marinig na kinuha ng ginang ang order ko. Nag-order ng 5 wings salt pepper mild on side. Tumawag sila sa number ko ipinakita ko ang ticket. Nagulat ako ng mabilis na lumabas ang order hindi ko na inisip iyon.
Got home realized Binigyan nila ako ng 4 Wings imbes na 5. Sinubukan kong tawagan walang sumasagot at patuloy na binababa ang telepono. Hindi na ako babalik sa lugar na ito. ๐ค Bad Service at malamig ang manok ko. Im sure mali yung order nila sakin.

Kamangha-manghang manok. Nagtitinda din sila ng deep fried catfish at ang galing talaga. Medyo malayo ang lokasyon sa Downtown pero mapupuntahan pa rin. Dapat subukan ang lugar kung ikaw ay nasa Chicago.

Hindi ko nagustuhan ang karanasan ko rito. Sinundan ko ang hype mula sa Tik Tok, at gusto kong matikman ang Chicago. Umorder ako ng 4-piece wings at fries. Itinapon ko ang fries ko sa basurahan. Hindi maanghang ang fries ko. Karaniwan lang ang manok. Walang nakapagparamdam sa akin na masarap ang manok. Sa totoo lang, parang sayang lang. Bukas ako sa pagsubok sa ibang pagkakataon at baka sa ibang lokasyon balang araw.

Nag-order ng 18 wings naghintay ng 20 minuto... cool! Kunin ang pagkain na hindi mainit na parang pinirito lang nila ito... umuwi ito ay mga piraso ng papel sa loob nito at mukhang sinira nila ang mga order nila na hindi kinuha ng mga tao at ginawa akong 18 piraso... hindi mainit ang mga fries at nilagyan nila ito ng napakaraming sarsa upang subukang pagtakpan ang katotohanan na hindi ito sariwang manok... ang sarsa ay hindi ito nabibigo sa manok ... sa air fryer dahil ayaw kong ibalik ito at nilalaro nila ito o kumuha ng refund at pumunta sa ibang lugar dahil hindi pa ito sariwang manok pagkatapos ng 10pmโฆ. locations.name: Chicago Lawn Harold's Chicken #17
locations.address: 2900 W 63rd St, Chicago, IL 60629, USA
reviews: New night manager is rude blocked my number from calling the store I ordered food to feed my kids and online the options are different from her poor excuse for messing up my order why give me bland chicken then claim itโs a charge for sauce on the side not on the chicken I have a toddler that doesnโt like sauce on his food how is one cup of sauce enough for a 24 piece and fries then she claimed they are not able to add lemon pepper on the side in app it said free but I got up charge for one sauce. Mind you this is my 10th time eating at this one will not order from here again chicken didnโt look like it normally does either highly frustrated
It was great and the $2 chicken only on Tuesday and $1.50 on Wednesday is great for everybody in need of some good fried chicken! So your and fresh made to order! Right on time!

Today was my first time here and I must say that the food was good,  hot, fresh, and  the service was speedy! They give you a nice amount of fries, one piece of bread, and cole slaw upon request. Definitely will go back and the inside was clean of you wanted to eat in there! Parking is hard to get since it's other businesses in that small area!

One of my favorite Haroldโs! Iโve never had an issue ordering ahead and picking up. The food has been consistentโฆexcept the okra. Please change be back to the original okra. Thank you to the staff for being great always!
I just landed at Chicago Midway Airport, and I'm hungry. I'm a native of Chicago, and I know where to find the eats. These wings were on point. Enough said.  ๐
Muy rico pollo frito,el mejor que he comido en Chicago .

La nueva gerente nocturna es grosera, bloqueรณ mi nรบmero para que no pudiera llamar a la tienda. Pedรญ comida para alimentar a mis hijos y en lรญnea las opciones son diferentes a su pobre excusa para arruinar mi pedido. ยฟPor quรฉ darme un pollo soso y luego decir que es un cargo por la salsa aparte, no por el pollo? Tengo un niรฑo pequeรฑo al que no le gusta la salsa en su comida. ยฟCรณmo es que una taza de salsa es suficiente para 24 piezas y papas fritas? Luego, afirmรณ que no pueden agregar pimienta de limรณn aparte. En la aplicaciรณn decรญa gratis, pero me cobraron por una salsa. Tenga en cuenta que esta es la dรฉcima vez que como en este lugar. No volverรฉ a pedir aquรญ. El pollo tampoco se veรญa como normalmente. Estoy muy frustrado.
Estuvo genial, y el pollo a solo $2 el martes y a $1.50 el miรฉrcoles es ideal para quienes buscan un buen pollo frito. ยกAsรญ que lo tienen y lo preparan al momento! ยกJusto a tiempo!

Hoy fue mi primera vez aquรญ y debo decir que la comida estaba buena, caliente, fresca y el servicio fue rรกpido. locations.name: Harold's Chicken Shack #69
locations.address: 9938 S Torrence Ave, Chicago, IL 60617, USA
reviews: Ms. Gina was a delight to speak with. She explained her way is a fresh drop when ordered. Definitely had some of the best tasting chicken.  With them dropping fresh. She said she needs 25 with anything with a bone in it.

The customer service there is horrible and awful. I will never set foot in there again.  I hope they are shut down.  I received my order (which was a delivery btw) and it was wrong! I ordered six wings with mild sauce and paid extra for extra sauce. I get my order and itโs completely dry!  I get in my car (which is an inconvenience) and drive up there. Iโm met with an attitude and  hostility, all because THEY messed up my order.  No apology or nothing. At the end of the day, I want what I ordered and should not have to argue with the employee that messed up the order. The young man who runs it when his mom is not there needs to be fired.   IT BE YOUR OWN PEOPLE.

The worst Harold's we have ever been to in our life. The staff attitude was so unprofessional and rude. We waited right at an hour for our food for it to be cold as heck after the long wait. We spent right at $70 and they gave me 1 hot/mild sauce for 4 different orders of food.
Ordered a small gizzard dinner and it was only 6 pieces in there.  Ordered 10 wings for $19.49 and had to throw it away because it wasn't fresh.
The lady attitude was jacked up because I asked her how much longer for my food and it went downhill from there. I asked for my money back but of course that was not an option.
To save from writing a book about this place, the easiest way to put it is, save your money and your time by going somewhere else if you don't want to be disappointed!

Highly disappointed in the lack of flavor!!! There was no seasoning whatsoever. The restaurant was clean and the customer service was excellent!! The chicken was hot and fresh but it was the most flavorless Harold's I have ever had. Unfortunately, I will not be returning to this location.

Very unprofessional customer services Issa keeps a business open. You canโt have cashier unaware of what menu items are not available before taking a customer money and having them wait thirty minutes. Then to be told after asking for a refund remember that after you let them know you donโt want four wings after waiting thirty minutes. I will never be back to this Harold again worst in the city. I expect more from black business

Fue un placer hablar con la Sra. Gina. Explicรณ que su mรฉtodo es servir pollo fresco al momento del pedido. Sin duda, probรฉ uno de los pollos mรกs sabrosos. Con el pollo fresco, me dijo que necesita 25 porciones de cualquier cosa con hueso.

El servicio al cliente es pรฉsimo. No volverรฉ a entrar. Espero que los cierren. Recibรญ mi pedido (que, por cierto, era a domicilio) ยกy estaba mal! Pedรญ seis alitas con salsa suave y paguรฉ mรกs por la salsa. ยกRecibo mi pedido y estรก completamente seco! Me subo al coche (lo cual es un inconveniente) y voy hasta allรญ. Me encuentro con una actitud hostil, todo porque metieron la pata con mi pedido. Ni una disculpa ni nada. Al final, quiero lo que pedรญ y no deberรญa tener que discutir con el empleado que metiรณ la pata. El joven que lo atiende cuando su madre no estรก deberรญa ser despedido. ยกSEAN SU PROPIA GENTE!

El peor Harold's al que hemos ido en nuestra vida. El personal fue muy poco profesional y grosero. Esperamos casi una hora por nuestra comida, que se enfriรณ muchรญsimo despuรฉs de la larga espera. Gastamos solo $70 y me dieron una salsa picante/suave para cuatro pedidos diferentes.
Pedรญ una cena pequeรฑa de mollejas y solo habรญa 6 piezas. Pedรญ 10 alitas por $19.49 y tuve que tirarlas porque no estaban frescas.
La actitud de la seรฑora fue desastrosa porque le preguntรฉ cuรกnto tardarรญa mi comida y la situaciรณn empeorรณ. Pedรญ que me devolvieran el dinero, pero, por supuesto, no era una opciรณn.
Para no escribir un libro sobre este lugar, la forma mรกs sencilla de decirlo es: ยกahorren dinero y tiempo yendo a otro lugar si no quieren decepcionarse!

ยกMuy decepcionado por la falta de sabor! No habรญa ningรบn condimento. El restaurante estaba limpio y el servicio al cliente fue excelente. El pollo estaba caliente y fresco, pero fue el Harold's mรกs insรญpido que he probado. Lamentablemente, no volverรฉ a este lugar.

El pรฉsimo servicio al cliente de Issa mantiene el negocio abierto. No se puede permitir que el cajero desconozca quรฉ platillos del menรบ no estรกn disponibles antes de cobrarle al cliente y hacerlo esperar treinta minutos. Y luego, despuรฉs de pedir un reembolso, que te digan que recuerdes que no quieres cuatro alitas tras esperar treinta minutos. Jamรกs volverรฉ a este Harold, el peor de la ciudad. Espero mรกs de un negocio afroamericano.

Masayang kausap si Ms. Gina. Ipinaliwanag niya na ang kanyang paraan ay isang sariwang patak kapag iniutos. Talagang nagkaroon ng ilan sa mga pinakamahusay na pagtikim ng manok.  Sa kanila bumabagsak na sariwa. Sinabi niya na kailangan niya ng 25 na may anumang bagay na may buto.

Ang customer service doon ay napakasama at napakasama. Hindi na ako makakapunta roon muli. Sana ay isara na sila. Natanggap ko ang order ko (na delivery pala) at mali pala! Umorder ako ng anim na pakpak na may banayad na sarsa at nagbayad pa para sa dagdag na sarsa. Natanggap ko ang order ko at tuyo na ang paligid! Sumakay ako sa kotse ko (na nakakainis) at nagmaneho papunta roon. Sinalubong ako ng masamang ugali at galit, lahat dahil SILA ang nagkamali sa order ko. Walang paghingi ng tawad o kahit ano. Sa huli, gusto ko ang inorder ko at hindi ko na kailangang makipagtalo sa empleyadong nagkamali sa order. Ang binata na nagpapatakbo nito kapag wala ang kanyang ina ay kailangang tanggalin sa trabaho. SARILING MGA TAO NA LANG ANG MAG-ALAGA.

Ang pinakapangit na Harold's na napuntahan namin sa buong buhay namin. Napaka-unprofessional at bastos ng mga staff. Naghintay kami ng halos isang oras bago lumamig ang pagkain namin pagkatapos ng mahabang paghihintay. Gumastos kami ng $70 at binigyan nila ako ng isang hot/mild sauce para sa apat na magkakaibang order ng pagkain.
Umorder ako ng maliit na gizzard dinner at anim na piraso lang ang laman. Umorder ako ng 10 wings sa halagang $19.49 at kinailangan ko itong itapon dahil hindi ito sariwa.
Nagalit ang dating ng babae dahil tinanong ko siya kung gaano katagal ang pagkain ko at pagkatapos noon ay nag-iba na ang takbo. Hiniling ko na ibalik ang pera ko pero siyempre hindi iyon ang opsyon.
Para makatipid sa pagsusulat ng libro tungkol sa lugar na ito, ang pinakamadaling paraan para sabihin ito ay, makatipid ng pera at oras sa pamamagitan ng pagpunta sa ibang lugar kung ayaw mong madismaya!

Lubos na nabigo sa kakulangan ng lasa!!! Walang anumang pampalasa. Malinis ang restaurant at napakahusay ng customer service!! Mainit at sariwa ang manok ngunit ito ang pinaka walang lasa na Harold's na natamo ko. Sa kasamaang palad, hindi ako babalik sa lokasyong ito.

Napaka-unpropesyonal na mga serbisyo sa customer na pinananatiling bukas ni Issa ang isang negosyo. Hindi ka maaaring magkaroon ng cashier na hindi alam kung anong mga item sa menu ang hindi magagamit bago kumuha ng pera ng customer at paghintayin sila ng tatlumpung minuto. Pagkatapos ay sasabihin pagkatapos humingi ng refund tandaan na pagkatapos mong ipaalam sa kanila na ayaw mo ng apat na pakpak pagkatapos maghintay ng tatlumpung minuto. Hindi na ako babalik sa Harold na ito na pinakamasama sa lungsod. Inaasahan ko ang higit pa mula sa itim na negosyo
