locations.name: Harold's Chicken #55 Express
locations.address: 8653 S State St, Chicago, IL 60619, USA
reviews:
A little history here. I've been going here since the other one across the Expressway closed. And I had to say I was very impressed. Food was hot sauce, was tasty. Wings were a good size service.
Was good, but recently that I mean within the last.
Ear, dear. I've gone in 3 times My first time within the last year, an incident occurred where I had placed my order. And a woman came into get her order upon getting her food. She was back in the restaurant within 8 minutes or so.  She came back in and complained to the staff that her wings were awfully salty. I didn't pay too much attention but I did hear Her. And upon her complaint, the staff Beth didn't refund her order. They were just saying well. No, it's not salty.  And I was like, wow, unfortunate for her, but as time passed, I got my order, I decided to sit in there. I like the ambiance. So no problem with the exception of a few flies that smell the sauce and.
I'm going to partake. Are I usually get 5 to 7 wings opening the bag in the package?  You know how it is wet and saucy paper. Listening in the Sun tables painted with Harold, zimblem and historic symbolism. I was feeling great.
Food was hot.  Just a perfect amount of sauce. Not drenched and not extremely decided to go ahead. Figure, oh God was at disappointment, salty salty salty and I found this the perfect time to address the staff like the woman before me.  I did. The lady's response was, oh no, well, it's not salty. It's just the seasoning that they put in, because you said no soul. Yes, but man, it's salty, are you listening staff was combative argumentative and decided to say okay, might have been just one wing and I taste it  But no once I gain composer shut down, finish 2 to 3 more wings with some fries fries by the way, paddle salt, but the audacity of this person to tell me that it's not salty, and there is a salty witness before me who complained.  I said wow. This must be under new ownership. So I granted an eyebrow and I just enjoyed the sauce. But salty salty is the word to. Day no upon coming back within the next month or so same result salt. Once again, I mentioned it to the staff. Once again, oh.  It must be when they seize in the chicken. No matter the excuse fix it. I'm saying to myself, so show about a month or 2 later came back. Same result salty so either. I don't know if it's new management. New workers new recipe or just plain sabotage is what I'm thinking.  But go and try it and enjoy your salty chicken with the family of flies that I'm sure we'll be there. Well, upon my next visit.

I was looking forward to this food all day and Iโm extremely upset with the service I received. First of all, I placed my order to be picked up at 10pm. It was a 8 wing with two sauces on the side. Simple right? I guess not. One would assume that means the order wouldnโt be made until near the pickup time the customer selects. I literally walked in AT 10pm on the dot and was told that my food had been sitting there for awhile. I then told the lady that well I placed my order to be picked up at 10pm which is SHOWS on the receipt. She told me it was still a little warm but she then asked the guy in the back if he had 8 wings he could make and he acted like it was a problem and he couldnโt do it. Iโm not the type to be a difficult customer or make a scene and she told me it was warm so I just let it go. I get home and my food is ICE COLD. THEN on top of that they didnโt even put my two sauces in the bag. So I paid nearly 25 bucks for ice cold chicken and couldnโt even get the sauces I paid for. What is the purpose of selecting a pickup time if youโre going to completely disregard it and make the meal way earlier when you feel like it to just get it out the way from what it seems. Isang maliit na kasaysayan dito. Papunta na ako dito since nagsara yung isa sa kabilang Expressway. At kailangan kong sabihin na labis akong humanga. Ang pagkain ay mainit na sarsa, ay masarap. Ang Wings ay isang magandang laki ng serbisyo.
Mabuti, ngunit kamakailan ang ibig kong sabihin sa loob ng huli.
Tenga, mahal. 3 beses na akong pumasok. Unang beses ko sa loob ng nakaraang taon, naganap ang isang insidente kung saan ako nag-order. At isang babae ang pumasok at kumuha ng kanyang order pagkakuha ng kanyang pagkain. Bumalik siya sa restaurant sa loob ng 8 minuto o higit pa.  Bumalik siya at nagreklamo sa mga tauhan na ang kanyang mga pakpak ay napakaalat. Hindi ko masyadong pinansin pero narinig ko siya. At sa kanyang reklamo, hindi ni-refund ng staff na si Beth ang kanyang order. Buti lang sinabi nila. Hindi, hindi ito maalat.  And I was like, wow, unfortunate for her, but as time passed, I got my order, I decided to sit in there. Gusto ko ang ambiance. Kaya walang problema maliban sa ilang langaw na amoy sarsa at.
Ako ay sasali. Karaniwan ba akong nakakakuha ng 5 hanggang 7 pakpak na nagbubukas ng bag sa pakete?  Alam mo kung paano ito ay basa at saucy na papel. Pakikinig sa Araw ng mga talahanayan na pininturahan ng Harold, zimblem at makasaysayang simbolismo. Napakasarap ng pakiramdam ko.
Mainit ang pagkain.  Isang perpektong dami ng sarsa lamang. Hindi basang-basa at hindi masyadong nagpasya na magpatuloy. Figure, oh God was at disappointment, salty salty salty and I found this the perfect time to address the staff like the woman before me.  ginawa ko. Ang sagot ng ginang ay, oh no, well, hindi naman maalat. Yung seasoning lang yung nilagay nila kasi sabi mo walang kaluluwa. Oo, pero pare, maalat, nakikinig ka bang staff was combative argumentative and decided to say okay, might have been just one wing and I taste it But no once I gain composer shut down, finish 2 to 3 wings with some fries fries by the way, paddle salt, pero ang lakas ng loob nitong taong ito na sabihin sa akin na wala pang maalat na saksi, and there is before me salty.  sabi ko wow. Ito ay dapat na nasa ilalim ng bagong pagmamay-ari. So I granted an eyebrow and I just enjoyed the sauce. Ngunit maalat maalat ang salitang to. Araw hindi sa pagbabalik sa loob ng susunod na buwan o higit pa sa parehong resulta asin. Muli, binanggit ko ito sa mga tauhan. Minsan pa naman oh.  Dapat kapag nang-aagaw sila sa manok. Kahit anong palusot ayusin mo. Sinasabi ko sa aking sarili, kaya ipakita ang tungkol sa isang buwan o 2 mamaya ay bumalik. Parehong resulta maalat kaya alinman. Hindi ko alam kung bagong management. New workers new recipe or just plain sabotage ang iniisip ko.  But go and try it and enjoy your salty chicken with the family of flies that I'm sure andiyan tayo. Well, sa susunod kong pagbisita.

Umorder ako ng malaking gizzard at marumi sila. Ibig kong sabihin, alam mo ang ilalim ng gizzard na ang piraso na hinugot mo ito ay nasa aking pritong gizzard. Hindi nila ito inalis. Halos hindi mo rin ito ma-nguya dahil napakatigas nito. Umorder din ako ng white half at binigyan nila ako ng dark half. Isa pa lang ang tao sa loob nung umorder ako ng pagkain ko.. So itโs not like they were busy.

Una ay hindi ako mahilig magbigay ng masamang pagsusuri ngunit dapat kong malaman na may mali sa pag-order online at handa na ito sa loob ng 10-15 minuto. Partikular kong sinabi na huwag magprito nang husto, lemon pepper at mild sauce. wala!

Nag-order ako ng dalawang dagdag na bahagi ng mild sauce, nagbigay ng tip, hindi ito bagong luto na in-order, masasabi mong refried ito o luma na ito at nakaupo na, kahit gaano kataas ang pagkain, bakit gagawin ng mga tao ang mga bagay na ganito sa utos ng mga tao, kaya hindi magandang serbisyo sa customer at sigurado ako kung nasa kabilang paa ang sapatos ay ganoon din ang mararamdaman nila.

Naiintindihan ko na maaaring mangyari ang mga pagkakamali ngunit sa kapinsalaan ng kung gaano kataas ang pagkain at kalusugan ng isang customer, hindi ito tama o propesyonal.

Nakaramdam ako ng sakit sa aking tiyan at sa pera na aking ginastos.

Kailangan itong pag-usapan at agad na gawin ang mga pagbabago.

Umorder ako ng 7 wings with hot and mild sauce. Ang pagkain ay kakila-kilabot. Ang pinakamasama na naranasan ko doon. Iโve HONESTLY had 2 day leftover chicken na pinainit ko na mas maganda.
Walang dahilan para sa isang order na inilagay ko at hinintay ng 12:30pm sa peak lunch time.

reviews: I order from here a lot and tonight was my 1st time calling them to complain I was missing items and my fries was old and cold never did the person asked if I wanted to come get my missing items or replace my cold food but what took the cake was when the young lady stated Iโll tell the cookโฆ. No compensate me AND BO LEMON PEPPER ๐ก๐ก

I was in this Harolds on 12/12 2026 at 610pm. The young lady at the register was counting her drawer down. She never acknowledged me waiting to order.  But the part was when she walked away came back, walked away again and sat down on her phone and never said anything.  When I said excuse me, she came back to the window and said nothing, holding her phone. I walked out. My 11 year old son looked at me and said "why are they so rude to people everytime we are in here. Then he said "that lady was extra rude for no reason". I hope the manager/owner reads this because she should not work with the public. We come here alot and the service has never be good ,but the food was fresh. I would never recommend this Harolds again.
Former customer:(

Iโve been coming to this Haroldโs for over 13 years, and year over year theyโve progressively gotten worse thatโs ended them where theyโre at currently - in the toilet. Their service is the worst part of the experience. In addition to lying about their wait times (often taking an additional 1.5 hours for 1 simple order), their actually employees are unpleasant, nonchalant and unprofessional. Marami akong order dito at ngayong gabi ay 1st time kong tumawag sa kanila para magreklamo na nawawalan ako ng mga gamit at luma na at malamig na ang fries ko kahit kailan ay hindi nagtanong ang tao kung gusto kong kunin ang mga nawawala kong gamit o palitan ang malamig kong pagkain ngunit ang kinuha ng cake ay nang sinabi ng dalaga na sasabihin ko sa tagapaglutoโฆ. Nasa Harolds na ito ako noong 12/12 2026 nang 610pm. Binibilang ng dalaga sa rehistro ang kanyang drawer. Hindi niya ako kinilala na naghihintay na mag-order.  Ngunit ang bahagi ay kapag siya ay lumayo ay bumalik, lumakad muli at umupo sa kanyang telepono at hindi nagsalita ng kahit ano.  Nang sabihin kong excuse me, bumalik siya sa bintana at walang sinabi, hawak ang phone niya. Nag walk out ako. My 11 year old son looked at me and said "why are they so rude to people everytime we are in here. Then he said "that lady was extra rude for no reason". Sana basahin ito ng manager/owner dahil hindi siya dapat magtrabaho kasama ang publiko. We come here alot and the service has never be good , but the food was fresh. I would never recommend this Harolds again.
Dating customer :(

Mahigit 13 taon na akong pumupunta rito sa Harold's, at taon-taon ay lalong lumalala ang sitwasyon kaya't nauwi sila sa kinalalagyan nila ngayon - sa banyo. Ang kanilang serbisyo ang pinakamasamang bahagi ng karanasan. Bukod sa pagsisinungaling tungkol sa kanilang oras ng paghihintay (madalas ay inaabot ng karagdagang 1.5 oras para sa isang simpleng order), ang kanilang mga empleyado ay hindi kaaya-aya, walang pakialam, at hindi propesyonal. Nakakalungkot makita na ang isang lugar na dating maaasahan dahil sa kanilang pagiging nasa oras at propesyonalismo ay nasisira at naging kahihiyan sa prangkisa ng Harold's.

Ang lokasyong ito ay kakila-kilabot na may mahinang serbisyo sa customer. Naglagay ako ng DoorDash order para sa pickup at pagdating ko ay sinabihan ako na wala sa kanila ang aking order kahit na pagkatapos kong ipakita sa kanila ang kumpirmasyon. Ang lalaking nasa bintana ay sobrang bastos at walang pakialam. Sinabi ko pa na babayaran ko ulit ang pagkain kung makakagawa lang siya at sinabi niya sa akin na hindi niya ito isyu at kunin ito sa DoorDash. Pagkatapos ay umalis ako at tinawagan ang tindahan dahil sinabi sa akin ng DoorDash na nakipag-usap sila sa kanila at sinabi ng tindahan sa DoorDash na ibinigay nila sa akin ang aking order. Ang dalaga sa lokasyong ito na nakausap ko sa telepono ay bastos at minumura ako at sinabing hindi siya "nakakaintindi sa sinasabi ko." Grabe at kailangan nilang isara

Nagkaroon ako ng hindi magandang karanasan sa una kong pagbisita sa Harolds Chicken noong nakaraang taon. Kaya pinayuhan akong subukan ang lugar na ito. Nakakamangha kung may mas maganda pa rito, gusto ko itong makita.

locations.name: Harold's chicken Oaklawn
locations.address: 4709 W 95th St, Oak Lawn, IL 60453, USA
reviews:
The first time I bought from here, shortly after they opened the Food was seasoned well, not stingy with the sauce. Service very friendly and efficient. Wings were a bit pricey 6 wings for $14. Gizzards reasonably priced. My number one go to!

Ffwd to almost two months later to today, I ordered the same thing. But they didn't put any lemon pepper as requested and was STINGY with the sauce. Very disappointing for the price and because it was early and not busy when I placed my order. I won't be back and I do not recommend this location--what a shame!

I was the 3rd person to order food it was only 3 customers in there im just now getting my food and leaving from 240pm til now. 330pm My food wasnโt even fixed the way I asked 12pc wing bucket fried hard with lemon pepper family coleslaw and fries. Food wasnโt hard, no lemon pepper, gave me a small coleslaw, and somewhat warm family fries. I finally gets home get ready to eat I put 6 wings on a plate went to put the other wings on a plate and itโs only 5 wings so now Iโm missing 1 wing. For it to have been my 1st time there, I will not be going back I will not be missing this location at all and the only reason it has any stars from me is because it wouldnโt let me post without putting the 1 star for each one

I read many reviews before visiting this Haroldโs Chicken location for the first time, and Iโm really glad I did. The food was very good, the environment was clean, and the staff was welcoming and friendly.

Even though the place was overcrowded, if any order got mixed up, they fixed it within a minute, which I really appreciated. I also want to clear something up for everyone โ they do put lemon pepper every time when asked. The lemon pepper soaks into the chicken, which is why you may not see it on top, but the flavor is definitely there.

Another important thing: the chicken is fresh, so it takes about 25 minutes to prepare, but the wait is absolutely worth it in the end. The buy-one-get-one offer on the 6-piece wings was awesome too.

One suggestion from a customer: please consider extending store hours. People like me who work night shifts or late hours would really appreciate it if the store stayed open until 1:00 AM. It would be great for town residents and late-night workers.

Overall, great experience, great food, and great service.
Also, please consider opening another location in or near Pulaski โ that would be amazing!

Highly recommended ๐

Taste good but after the first time they got every order incorrect. One time everything was plain when I requested sauces and they messed up the make up order after repeating it back to me a few times. Itโs either missing the sauces requested or plain. The make up order also didnโt have much sauce on it and this time included bread which my other orders didnt. I paid for extra sauce the first time and basically paid for nothing because it was the same amount of sauce as my husbandโs order that had regular sauce. Maybe need to follow the instructions on receipt idk. It tastes good but just incorrect most of the time.

By way of Texas! Stop by before going to Midway Airport and selected a 4 wing meal. The wings were freshly fried to order. This meal slabbed my taste buds with a delicious favor. The mild sauce was a first for me and in my opinion it complimented the chicken perfectly. I highly recommend.
Excelente servicio comida deliciosa las wings que delicia y con la salsita dulce
Las uvas son los mejor las alitas y los camarones son mis favoritos
Buena comida

La primera vez que comprรฉ aquรญ, poco despuรฉs de abrir, la comida estaba bien sazonada y la salsa no era tacaรฑa. El servicio fue muy amable y eficiente. Las alitas eran un poco caras: 6 alitas por $14. Las mollejas tenรญan un precio razonable. ยกMi lugar favorito!

Casi dos meses despuรฉs, pedรญ lo mismo. Pero no le pusieron pimienta de limรณn como pedรญ y la salsa fue tacaรฑa. Muy decepcionante por el precio y porque era temprano y no habรญa mucha gente cuando hice mi pedido. No volverรฉ y no recomiendo este lugar, ยกquรฉ lรกstima!

Fui la tercera persona en pedir comida, solo habรญa 3 clientes allรญ, reciรฉn ahora recibo mi comida y me voy desde las 2:40 p. m. hasta ahora. 3:30 p. m. Mi comida ni siquiera estaba preparada de la manera que pedรญ, cubo de 12 alitas fritas con ensalada de col familiar de pimienta de limรณn y papas fritas. La comida no estaba dura, sin pimienta de limรณn, me dieron una ensalada de col pequeรฑa y papas fritas familiares algo calientes. Finalmente lleguรฉ a casa, me preparรฉ para comer, puse 6 alitas en un plato, fui a poner las otras alitas en un plato y solo eran 5 alitas, asรญ que ahora me falta 1 ala. Para haber sido mi primera vez allรญ, no volverรฉ, no extraรฑarรฉ este lugar en absoluto y la รบnica razรณn por la que tiene estrellas de mi parte es porque no me dejรณ publicar sin poner 1 estrella para cada una.

The first time I buy from here, maya maya lang nabuksan nila ang Food ay tinimplahan ng husto, hindi maramot sa sauce. Ang serbisyo ay napaka-friendly at mahusay. Ang mga pakpak ay medyo mahal 6 na pakpak para sa $14. Makatuwirang presyo ang mga gizzards. Ang aking numero uno pumunta sa!

Ffwd to almost two months later to today, ganun din ang inorder ko. Pero wala silang nilagay na lemon pepper as requested at KAROT sa sauce. Very disappointing for the price at dahil maaga pa at hindi busy nung nag-order ako. Hindi na ako babalik at hindi ko inirerekomenda ang lokasyong ito--nakakahiya!

Ako ang pangatlong umorder ng pagkain, tatlong customer lang ang naroon. Ngayon lang ako kumuha ng pagkain ko at aalis na mula 2:40 PM hanggang ngayon. 3:30 PM. Hindi pa nga naayos ang pagkain ko gaya ng hiniling ko. 12 piraso ng wing bucket na prito na may lemon pepper at fries. Hindi matigas ang pagkain, walang lemon pepper, binigyan ako ng maliit na coleslaw, at medyo mainit na family fries. Sa wakas ay nakauwi na ako at naghanda na para kumain. Naglagay ako ng 6 na wings sa plato at inilagay ko ang iba pang wings sa plato at 5 wings lang naman ito kaya ngayon, isang wing na lang ang kulang. Dahil ito ang unang beses ko roon, hindi na ako babalik. Hindi ko talaga mami-miss ang lugar na ito at ang tanging dahilan kung bakit may mga bituin ito mula sa akin ay dahil hindi nila ako pinapayagang mag-post nang hindi naglalagay ng 1 bituin para sa bawat isa.

Nagbasa ako ng maraming review bago bumisita sa lokasyon ng Harold's Chicken sa unang pagkakataon, at talagang natutuwa akong ginawa ko ito. Napakasarap ng pagkain, malinis ang kapaligiran, at magiliw at magiliw ang mga staff.

Kahit na masikip ang lugar, kung anumang order ay nagkahalo, inayos nila ito sa loob ng isang minuto, na talagang na-appreciate ko. Gusto ko ring i-clear ang isang bagay para sa lahat โ naglalagay sila ng lemon pepper tuwing tatanungin. Ang lemon pepper ay bumabad sa manok, kaya naman hindi mo ito makikita sa ibabaw, ngunit tiyak na nandoon ang lasa.

Isa pang mahalagang bagay: ang manok ay sariwa, kaya ito ay tumatagal ng mga 25 minuto upang maghanda, ngunit ang paghihintay ay talagang sulit sa dulo. Ang alok na buy-one-get-one sa 6-piece wings ay kahanga-hanga rin.

Isang mungkahi mula sa isang customer: mangyaring isaalang-alang ang pagpapahaba ng mga oras ng tindahan. Ang mga taong tulad ko na nagtatrabaho ng mga night shift o late hours ay talagang maa-appreciate kung mananatiling bukas ang tindahan hanggang 1:00 AM. Ito ay magiging mahusay para sa mga residente ng bayan at mga manggagawa sa gabi.

Sa pangkalahatan, mahusay na karanasan, mahusay na pagkain, at mahusay na serbisyo.
Gayundin, mangyaring isaalang-alang ang pagbubukas ng isa pang lokasyon sa o malapit sa Pulaski โ na magiging kahanga-hanga!

Lubhang inirerekomenda ๐

Masarap naman pero pagkatapos ng unang beses, mali ang bawat order nila. Minsan, puro sarsa lang ang hiniling ko at nagkamali sila sa makeup order matapos itong paulit-ulit na ibalik sa akin. Kulang ang sarsa na hiniling o puro lang. Kulang din ang sarsa sa makeup order at ngayon, kasama na ang tinapay na wala sa ibang order ko. Nagbayad ako ng extrang sarsa noong una at halos wala akong binayaran dahil pareho lang ang dami ng sarsa ng order ng asawa ko na may regular na sarsa. Siguro kailangan kong sundin ang mga instruksyon sa resibo, hindi ko alam. Masarap naman pero madalas mali lang.

Daan sa Texas! Dumaan muna kayo bago pumunta sa Midway Airport at pumili ng 4 wing meal. Ang mga pakpak ay bagong prito ayon sa order. Ang pagkaing ito ay pumukaw sa aking panlasa. Ang banayad na sarsa ang una kong naranasan at sa aking palagay ay bumagay ito sa manok. Lubos kong inirerekomenda.

Gumastos ako ng $75 at hindi pa luto ang isda. Nang ibalik ko ito, hiniling kong ipagpalit sa tsaa nila. Hindi ako pinayagan ng lalaki sa likod ng counter dahil $7.00 ang tsaa. Sa tingin ko, kung may customer na nagsasabi na hindi masarap ang pagkain nila, dapat mong pagbigyan ang customer na iyon. Hindi na ako kakain dito ulit.
Mas bagong lokasyon. Binisita ko ang opening week. Nagkaroon sila ng 10 piece wing special. Mainit/sariwa ang pagkain. Magandang lasa.

Napakasaya ko na magkaroon ng Harold's out west!! Isang taga-Southside at ang connoisseur ni Harold ay hindi ako nabigo. Ang tindahan ay malinis, maliwanag at kaakit-akit. Puno ang menu, at hindi limitado. Ang bawat item na na-order ko ay nasa stock. Ang pagkain ay sariwa, mainit at hindi refried. Meron din silang steaked at filleted na hito!!๐ Authentic๐ฏ. Naging kaaya-aya at palakaibigan ang customer service team. Late din silang bukas!! Lahat ng naranasan ko ay naging positibo. Bagama't maaaring limitado ang paradahan, nagawa kong huminto pataas nang walang mga isyu. Lubos kong inirerekumenda!!๐ฏ๐ช๐พ

(3 tao) Sinabi sa akin ni Jordan na makakasama ko na siya maya-maya, sabi niya 5 minuto na lang...Hmmm? At oo, binigyan ko siya ng tip na maganda para doon!ยก! $$$

locations.name: Harolds Chicken Shack #27
locations.address: 10259 S Halsted St, Chicago, IL 60628, USA
reviews: The lady at the window was rude. I asked her about sauce on my chicken and she said it was on the side. I  asked could they put it on and she said they won't take it back. I checked when I got to the car and saw it wasn't any on the side, either. I had to go back inside to ask for sauce. She then gave me 2 cups of sauce. Nobody should be that dry in customer service. I understand it's Harold's, but still...

This has always hands down been my favorite Harold's since I started driving in 2000. I always tell people to go here. No matter what time of any day, this Harold's has NEVER failed me. Unfortunately today, I was highly disappointed. I ordered 6 wings with mild and hot and the wings were awful tasting. They were really dark, the fries were undercooked, and the sauce was completely different from what I've always had (not good).  I understand that change could be good but whatever changes they're making here is a bad decision. It's unfortunate because the cost of food now a days, I cannot support this location anymore due to this bad experience. I'll be sure to tell others of my experience today as well. Sorry!

I always see debates about which Harolds is the best. This location on 103rd and Halsted has never ever disappointed! Food always hot and fresh. Cashier super friendly and I've never had to wait an unusual amount of time.
My ONLY issue is that they do not answer the phone all the time, so you may not be able to call in an order.
This Haroldโs slow as hell Iโve been waiting 40 minutes on 6 wings and no it wasnโt crowded. They also didnโt take call in orders. Food doesnโt taste fresh either

I will never order from this Harold's location again. Every time, they fail to read the instructions on UBER EATS leaving me food I have to doctor up. It's frustrating because the wings are cooked to perfection, but clearly, somebody there can't read. They don't cook it fresh either; I have to reheat and make the food myself hot despite me living only a few minutes (5-minute drive). They never pick up the phone, so there's no way to resolve the issue. If you want decent food, go in-person and avoid ordering off Uber Eats. Look how they didn't even put SAUCE on the food ๐ค๐ค๐ค

La seรฑora de la ventanilla fue grosera. Le preguntรฉ por la salsa del pollo y me dijo que era aparte. Le preguntรฉ si podรญan ponerla y me dijo que no la aceptan. Al llegar al coche, revisรฉ y vi que tampoco era aparte. Tuve que volver adentro a pedir salsa. Me dio dos tazas de salsa. Nadie deberรญa ser tan seco en atenciรณn al cliente. Entiendo que es Harold's, pero aun asรญ...

Este siempre ha sido, sin lugar a dudas, mi Harold's favorito desde que empecรฉ a conducir en el aรฑo 2000. Siempre le recomiendo a la gente que vaya. A cualquier hora del dรญa, este Harold's NUNCA me ha decepcionado. Lamentablemente, hoy me decepcionรฉ muchรญsimo. Pedรญ 6 alitas con picante suave y picante, y tenรญan un sabor horrible. Estaban muy oscuras, las papas fritas estaban poco hechas y la salsa era completamente diferente a la que siempre he probado (no estaba buena). Entiendo que los cambios pueden ser buenos, pero cualquier cambio que estรฉn haciendo aquรญ es una mala decisiรณn. Es una lรกstima, debido al alto precio de la comida hoy en dรญa, que ya no pueda apoyar este lugar debido a esta mala experiencia. Me asegurarรฉ de contarles a otros sobre mi experiencia de hoy tambiรฉn. ยกLo siento!

Siempre veo debates sobre cuรกl Harolds es el mejor. ยกEste local en la calle 103 y Halsted nunca me ha decepcionado! La comida siempre estรก caliente y fresca. El cajero es sรบper amable y nunca he tenido que esperar mucho tiempo.
Mi รบnico problema es que no contestan el telรฉfono siempre, asรญ que quizรกs no puedas hacer un pedido por telรฉfono.
Este Harold's es un rollo. Llevo 40 minutos esperando 6 alitas y no, no habรญa mucha gente. Tampoco atendรญan pedidos por telรฉfono. La comida tampoco sabe fresca.

Nunca volverรฉ a pedir en este local de Harold's. Cada vez que no leen las instrucciones de Uber Eats y me dejan comida, tengo que manipularla. Es frustrante porque las alitas estรกn cocinadas a la perfecciรณn, pero claramente, alguien allรญ no sabe leer. Tampoco la cocinan fresca; tengo que recalentarla yo mismo a pesar de vivir a solo unos minutos (5 minutos en coche). Nunca contestan el telรฉfono, asรญ que no hay forma de resolver el problema. Si quieres comida decente, ve en persona y evita pedir por Uber Eats. ยกMira cรณmo ni siquiera le pusieron salsa! ๐ค๐ค๐ค

Masungit ang babae sa bintana. I asked her about sauce on my chicken and she said nasa gilid. Tinanong ko kung pwede ba nila itong isuot at ang sabi niya ay hindi na nila ito babawiin. Tiningnan ko nang makarating ako sa kotse at nakita kong wala din sa gilid. Kailangan kong bumalik sa loob para humingi ng sauce. Pagkatapos ay binigyan niya ako ng 2 tasa ng sarsa. Walang sinuman ang dapat na tuyo sa serbisyo sa customer. Alam kong kay Harold iyon, pero...

Ito na talaga ang paborito kong Harold's simula nang magsimula akong magmaneho noong 2000. Palagi kong sinasabi sa mga tao na pumunta rito. Kahit anong oras ng araw, HINDI ako binigo nitong Harold's. Sa kasamaang palad ngayon, labis akong nadismaya. Umorder ako ng 6 na pakpak na may mild and hot at ang sarap ng pakpak. Madilim talaga ang mga ito, hindi pa nalutong ang fries, at ibang-iba ang sarsa sa dati kong kinakain (hindi masarap). Naiintindihan ko na maaaring maganda ang pagbabago pero anumang pagbabago ang gagawin nila rito ay isang maling desisyon. Nakakalungkot dahil sa mahal na ng pagkain ngayon, hindi ko na kayang suportahan ang lugar na ito dahil sa hindi magandang karanasang ito. Ikukuwento ko rin sa iba ang karanasan ko ngayon. Pasensya na!

Palagi akong nakakakita ng mga debate kung sino si Harolds ang pinakamagaling. Ang lokasyong ito sa 103rd at Halsted ay hindi kailanman nabigo! Ang pagkain ay laging mainit at sariwa. Napakabait ng cashier at hindi ko na kinailangan pang maghintay ng hindi pangkaraniwang tagal ng oras.
Ang LAMANG kong isyu ay hindi nila sinasagot ang telepono sa lahat ng oras, kaya maaaring hindi ka makatawag sa isang order.
This Harold's slow as hell I've been waiting 40 minutes on 6 wings and no it wasn't crowded. Hindi rin sila tumanggap ng mga call in order. Hindi rin sariwa ang lasa ng pagkain

locations.name: Harold's Chicken Bronzeville
locations.address: 503 E 47th St, Chicago, IL 60653, USA
reviews: Affordable and delicious!  I donโt get to Chicago much anymore but when I do, Bronzeville Gap Haroldโs is our go-to for freshly fried Fried Chicken with hot sauce on wonder bread!  Perfection every time!  And Iโm able to grab a bottle of hot sauce to go!

This place is absolutely terrible. The food, pricing, customer service, and even the locationโall awful. We called in an order for the 10-piece wing special with lemon pepper seasoning on the wings and mild sauce on the side. We were told it would be ready in 20 minutes. When we arrived, not only was the food not ready, they were just dropping the fries. When we finally got home, we realized they didnโt include the mild sauce at all. The fries were undercooked, and the lemon pepper seasoning was dumped unevenly in one spot on the wings. We called to let them know about the issues, and the man on the phone was argumentative instead of apologetic. We paid over $21 for 10 poorly made wings and honestly, it was a complete waste. Theyโll never get another dollar from me.

I called several times to place an order and never got an answerโฆ. Went there and there were only two people in there and both had already orderedโฆ. I stood at the window for ten minutes and the girl who was taking the order never came to the windowโฆ.. instead she decided to play music in the backโฆ. I stood there and called the number to see if they would pick upโฆ I never heard a phone ringโฆ. The man who was cooking in the back was standing up noddingโฆ. The girl pulled a cover so we couldnโt seeโฆ. I walked out of the placeโฆ. I do not recommend this Harolds

Not only are you not open on a Thursday afternoon at 2pm, as Iโm reading the reviews the owner responds to a customer by downplaying another Haroldโs smh.. As a business owner thatโs nasty work do better๐คฎ

Iโve enjoying the wonderful flavors of Haroldโs since I was a child like most Chicagoans, and over the years the taste has changed, but this location definitely takes me back to the good ole days! The owners are always striving to make every bite your best! The food is always fresh, the sauce is perfect and when you say fried hard, thatโs exactly what you get! Probably my new favorite location!

ยกAsequible y delicioso! Ya no voy mucho a Chicago, pero cuando voy, Bronzeville Gap Harold's es nuestro lugar predilecto para comer pollo frito reciรฉn hecho con salsa picante en pan maravilloso. ยกSiempre perfecto! ยกY puedo comprarme una botella de salsa picante para llevar!

Este lugar es absolutamente terrible. La comida, el precio, el servicio al cliente e incluso la ubicaciรณn, todo horrible. Llamamos para pedir el especial de 10 alitas con aderezo de pimienta y limรณn y salsa suave al lado. Nos dijeron que estarรญa listo en 20 minutos. Cuando llegamos, no solo no estaba lista la comida, sino que simplemente se les estaban cayendo las papas fritas. Cuando finalmente llegamos a casa, nos dimos cuenta de que no incluรญan la salsa suave. Las papas estaban crudas y el aderezo de pimienta y limรณn estaba esparcido de forma desigual en un solo lugar de las alitas. Llamamos para informarles sobre el problema, y โโel hombre al telรฉfono discutiรณ en lugar de disculparse. Pagamos mรกs de $21 por 10 alitas mal hechas y, honestamente, fue un desperdicio total. Nunca mรกs me volverรกn a cobrar.

Llamรฉ varias veces para pedir y nunca obtuve respuesta. Fui y solo habรญa dos personas y ambas ya habรญan pedido. Estuve diez minutos en la ventanilla y la chica que tomaba la orden nunca apareciรณ. En su lugar, decidiรณ poner mรบsica en la trastienda. Me quedรฉ allรญ y marquรฉ el nรบmero para ver si contestaban. No oรญ sonar el telรฉfono. El hombre que cocinaba en la trastienda estaba de pie asintiendo. La chica corriรณ una manta para que no pudiรฉramos ver. Salรญ del lugar. No recomiendo este Harolds.

Affordable at masarap!  Hindi na ako gaanong nakakapunta sa Chicago pero kapag nakarating na ako, ang Bronzeville Gap Harold's ang pinuntahan namin para sa bagong pritong Fried Chicken na may mainit na sarsa sa wonder bread!  Perpekto sa bawat oras!  At nakakakuha ako ng isang bote ng mainit na sarsa para pumunta!

Ang lugar na ito ay talagang kakila-kilabot. Ang pagkain, pagpepresyo, serbisyo sa customer, at maging ang lokasyonโnakakatakot lahat. Nag-order kami para sa 10-piece wing special na may lemon pepper seasoning sa mga pakpak at mild sauce sa gilid. Sinabi sa amin na magiging handa ito sa loob ng 20 minuto. Pagdating namin, hindi lang nakahanda ang pagkain, nilalaglag lang nila ang fries. Nang sa wakas ay nakauwi na kami, napagtanto namin na hindi nila kasama ang mild sauce. Ang mga fries ay kulang sa luto, at ang lemon pepper seasoning ay itinapon nang hindi pantay sa isang lugar sa mga pakpak. Tumawag kami upang ipaalam sa kanila ang tungkol sa mga isyu, at ang lalaki sa telepono ay nakikipagtalo sa halip na humihingi ng tawad. Nagbayad kami ng mahigit $21 para sa 10 hindi magandang pagkakagawa ng mga pakpak at sa totoo lang, ito ay isang kumpletong pag-aaksaya. Hindi na sila makakakuha ng isa pang dolyar mula sa akin.

Ilang beses akong tumawag para mag-order pero wala akong nakuhang sagot.... Pumunta doon at dalawa lang ang tao sa loob at pareho na silang nag-order.... Nakatayo ako sa bintana sa loob ng sampung minuto at ang batang babae na kumukuha ng order ay hindi kailanman lumapit sa bintanaโฆ.. sa halip ay nagpasya siyang magpatugtog ng musika sa likodโฆ. Tumayo ako roon at tinawagan ang numero para tingnan kung kukuha sila... Wala akong narinig na ring ng telepono.... Ang lalaking nagluluto sa likod ay nakatayong tumatango.... Naghila ng takip ang babae para hindi namin makita... Naglakad na ako palabas ng lugar... Hindi ko inirerekomenda ito Harolds
Hindi ka lang bukas tuwing Huwebes ng hapon ng 2pm, habang binabasa ko ang mga review na tinugon ng may-ari sa isang customer sa pamamagitan ng pag-downplay sa ibang Harold's smh.

Tinatangkilik ko ang kahanga-hangang lasa ni Harold mula noong bata pa ako tulad ng karamihan sa mga taga-Chicago, at sa paglipas ng mga taon ay nagbago ang lasa, ngunit ang lokasyong ito ay tiyak na nagbabalik sa akin sa magagandang araw! Ang mga may-ari ay palaging nagsusumikap na gawin ang bawat kagat ng iyong pinakamahusay! Ang pagkain ay laging sariwa, ang sarsa ay perpekto at kapag sinabi mong pinirito nang husto, iyon mismo ang makukuha mo! Marahil ang aking bagong paboritong lokasyon!

locations.address: 7318 S Vincennes Ave, Chicago, IL 60621, USA
reviews: Was craving some Yard Bird. On point Delish! Phoned in my order ahead of time and it was hot and ready when I arrived. Haroldโs Chicken hasnโt changed, the white bread under your fries and chicken above, just love how the bread soaks up all that goodness. 5 pc Mild wings with fries and a pc of bread only $11. B Wild wings and Wing-stop AINโT got nothing ON Haroldโs! Street parking in front. No frills type of place hence the word SHACK in its name. Thank you Haroldโs #13

I saw the harolds truck on my way home and i really thought it was the one from 87th street ,but i was informed it was from this location; no problem i will give them a try.  The chicken was all right but the sauce didnt taste like harold's sauce.  i definitely won't be ordering from this truck again.

Haroldโs Chicken Shack #13 is a must-visit for classic Chicago fried chicken! I tried their hot wings and they were perfectly crispy, juicy, and packed with flavor. The sides, especially the mac and cheese, were creamy and delicious, making the meal even better. The staff were friendly and quick, even during a busy lunch rush. A true neighborhood favorite for anyone craving authentic, hearty fried chicken!

Purchased a wing and gizzard combo. They lady took my order was very nice ,but the food was terrible im upset because these gizzards was plain and cooked twice . Just look at the picture . If I was tired I would take this back.  I basically paid $12 for 3 wings and fries because I was not eating the gizzards .

I ordered uber eats delivery and it was disgusting. My wings were not fresh and my order was wrong. I had one 5piece wing and a 4piece. Both did not have lemon pepper on them and they also were not fried hard. Will not be ordering from this location at all.

Tenรญa antojo de Yard Bird. ยกDelicioso! Pedรญ por telรฉfono con antelaciรณn y estaba caliente y listo cuando lleguรฉ. El pollo de Harold's no ha cambiado: el pan blanco debajo de las papas fritas y el pollo encima; me encanta cรณmo el pan absorbe toda esa delicia. 5 alitas suaves con papas fritas y una pieza de pan por solo $11. ยกLas alitas B Wild y Wing-stop no tienen nada que envidiar a Harold's! Hay estacionamiento en la calle enfrente. Un lugar sencillo, de ahรญ la palabra SHACK en su nombre. Gracias, Harold's #13

Vi el camiรณn de Harold's de camino a casa y pensรฉ que era el de la calle 87, pero me informaron que era de este lugar. No hay problema, lo probarรฉ. El pollo estaba bien, pero la salsa no sabรญa a salsa Harold's. Definitivamente no volverรฉ a pedir de este camiรณn.

Haroldโs Chicken Shack #13 es una visita obligada para disfrutar del clรกsico pollo frito de Chicago. Probรฉ sus alitas picantes y estaban perfectamente crujientes, jugosas y llenas de sabor. Las guarniciones, especialmente los macarrones con queso, eran cremosas y deliciosas, lo que hizo la comida aรบn mejor. El personal fue amable y rรกpido, incluso durante las horas punta del almuerzo. ยกUn verdadero favorito del barrio para cualquiera que desee un autรฉntico y sustancioso pollo frito!

Si estuviera cansado, lo devolverรญa. Paguรฉ $12 por tres alitas y papas fritas porque no me comรญ las mollejas.

Naghahangad ako ng Yard Bird. Ang sarap! Tinawagan ko na ang order ko nang maaga at mainit at handa na ito pagdating ko. Hindi nagbago ang Harold's Chicken, ang puting tinapay sa ilalim ng fries at manok sa itaas, gustong-gusto ko kung paano sinisipsip ng tinapay ang lahat ng iyon. 5 piraso ng Mild wings na may fries at isang piraso ng tinapay, $11 lang. B. Walang kwenta ang Wild wings at Wing-stop sa Harold's! May paradahan sa kalye sa harap. Parang walang palamuti ang lugar kaya may salitang SHACK sa pangalan nito. Salamat Harold's #13

Nakita ko ang trak ng harolds pauwi at inisip ko talaga na ito ang mula sa 87th street, ngunit napag-alaman sa akin na ito ay mula sa lokasyong ito; walang problema susubukan ko sila.  Ayos lang ang manok pero hindi katulad ng sarsa ni harold ang sarsa.  Tiyak na hindi na ako mag-o-order mula sa trak na ito.

Ang Harold's Chicken Shack #13 ay isang dapat-bisitahin para sa klasikong Chicago fried chicken! Sinubukan ko ang kanilang mainit na mga pakpak at sila ay ganap na malutong, makatas, at puno ng lasa. Ang mga gilid, lalo na ang mac at keso, ay creamy at masarap, na nagpapasarap sa pagkain. Ang mga staff ay magiliw at mabilis, kahit na sa isang abalang pananghalian. Isang tunay na paborito ng kapitbahayan para sa sinumang nagnanais ng tunay at masaganang pritong manok!

Bumili ng wing at gizzard combo. Kinuha ng babae ang aking order ay napakasarap, ngunit ang pagkain ay kahila-hilakbot na im upset dahil ang mga gizzards na ito ay plain at luto ng dalawang beses. Tingnan mo lang ang larawan. Kung pagod na ako ay babawiin ko ito.  Karaniwang nagbayad ako ng $12 para sa 3 pakpak at fries dahil hindi ako kumakain ng mga gizzards.

Nag-order ako ng uber eat delivery at nakakadiri. Hindi sariwa ang mga pakpak ko at mali ang order ko. Mayroon akong isang 5 pirasong pakpak at isang 4 na piraso. Parehong walang lemon pepper sa kanila at hindi rin sila pinirito nang husto. Hindi mag-o-order mula sa lokasyong ito.

locations.name: Harold's Chicken Avondale
locations.address: 3517 N Spaulding Ave, Chicago, IL 60618, USA
reviews: Haroldโs Chicken Avondale is the perfect spot for chicken wings. Arguably the best chicken restaurant in Picnic Digital Food Court. We order the 8 Piece Wings, Large Fries, and Mild sauce. The chicken was cooked up quickly and was both crispy and flavorful! We will be back for more soon!

I genuinely tried to give the new Haroldโs in Avondale a fair chance. Iโve been eating Haroldโs from different locations across Chicago for over 20 years, so I know the classic Haroldโs flavor, texture, and quality. Even after seeing the string of 1-star reviews, we still placed an orderโmainly because the Haroldโs on Milwaukee & Wood wasnโt taking orders that day.
We ordered from UberEats two 6-piece wings with black pepper on everything, plus mild and hot sauce on the side, using the Buy 1 Get 1 Free promotion. Somehow, all four trays were disappointing. The chicken was dark, bitter, and tasted like it had been fried in old grease. The crust was extremely hardโmore like it had been cooked earlier, left sitting around, and then dropped back in the fryer. Nothing about it tasted fresh, or even close to the Haroldโs standard Iโve known for two decades.

What really made me shake my head is that most Haroldโs locations proudly display the famous sign: โAll orders cooked fresh to order โ 20 minutes or more.โ Itโs practically a Haroldโs cultural landmark at this point. But this location must have reinvented the slogan, because nothing in our order tasted โfresh to order.โ If anything, it tasted more like โsat for 20 minutes or moreโ before being reheated.

I took photos because the difference between this batch and what real Haroldโs should look like is night and day. As someone who has eaten Haroldโs consistently for 20+ years, this was one of the most disappointing Haroldโs experiences Iโve ever had. I really hope the quality improves, because Avondale deserves better than four trays of overcooked, stale-tasting wings.

Located in a digital food court, but very easy to order and pick-up. The chicken and fish were both FRESH and Flavorful.

One of the best in terms of taste and convenience in the area.

Iโve tried their wings and catfish on two separate occasions and both have great portion sizes and follow the original recipe to curb the Haroldโs cravings.

I just ordered food requesting for the sauce on the side.. instead they completely ignored my request and the sauce altogether. This is my first time experiencing Haroldโs Chicken and Iโve missed the supposedly best part.. the sauce. Chicken is good but super disappointed. Please check your order if you decide to order from this spot.
The tenders and fries were fresh and perfectly seasoned OMG. Theyโre not stingy with the sauce either! 100000/10, thank you for bringing good chicken to the north side!

Haroldโs Chicken Avondale es el lugar perfecto para alitas de pollo. Sin duda, el mejor restaurante de pollo en el patio de comidas Picnic Digital. Pedimos 8 alitas, papas fritas grandes y salsa suave. ยกEl pollo se cocinรณ rรกpido y estaba crujiente y sabroso! ยกVolveremos pronto!

De verdad intentรฉ darle una oportunidad al nuevo Harold's de Avondale. Llevo mรกs de 20 aรฑos comiendo Harold's en diferentes locales de Chicago, asรญ que conozco el sabor, la textura y la calidad del clรกsico Harold's. Incluso despuรฉs de ver la serie de reseรฑas de 1 estrella, hicimos un pedido, principalmente porque el Harold's de Milwaukee & Wood no aceptaba pedidos ese dรญa.
Pedimos por UberEats dos alitas de 6 piezas con pimienta negra por encima, ademรกs de salsa suave y picante aparte, aprovechando la promociรณn "Compra 1 y llรฉvate 1 gratis". Por alguna razรณn, las cuatro bandejas fueron decepcionantes. El pollo estaba oscuro, amargo y sabรญa como si lo hubieran frito en grasa vieja. La corteza estaba extremadamente dura, como si lo hubieran cocinado antes, lo hubieran dejado reposar y luego lo hubieran vuelto a freรญr. No tenรญa ningรบn sabor fresco, ni siquiera parecido al estรกndar de Harold's que conozco desde hace dos dรฉcadas.

Lo que realmente me dejรณ perplejo es que la mayorรญa de los locales de Harold's exhiben con orgullo el famoso letrero: "Todos los pedidos se cocinan frescos al momento โ 20 minutos o mรกs". A estas alturas, es prรกcticamente un referente cultural de Harold's. Pero este local debiรณ reinventar el eslogan, porque nada en nuestro pedido sabรญa a "fresco al momento". De hecho, sabรญa mรกs a "reposado durante 20 minutos o mรกs" antes de ser recalentado.

Tomรฉ fotos porque la diferencia entre este lote y cรณmo deberรญa verse el verdadero Harold's es enorme. Como alguien que ha comido en Harold's constantemente durante mรกs de 20 aรฑos, esta fue una de las experiencias mรกs decepcionantes que he tenido en Harold's. Espero de verdad que la calidad mejore, porque Avondale se merece algo mejor que cuatro bandejas de alitas demasiado cocidas y rancias.

Ubicado en un patio de comidas digital, pero muy fรกcil de ordenar y recoger. El pollo y el pescado estaban frescos y sabrosos.

Uno de los mejores en cuanto a sabor y conveniencia en la zona.

He probado sus alitas y bagre en dos ocasiones distintas y ambos tienen porciones generosas y siguen la receta original para satisfacer mis antojos de Harold's.

Pedรญ comida y pedรญ la salsa aparte... pero ignoraron por completo mi peticiรณn y la salsa. Es la primera vez que pruebo Harold's Chicken y me perdรญ lo que se supone que es lo mejor: la salsa. El pollo estรก bueno, pero me decepcionรณ muchรญsimo. Por favor, revisen su pedido si deciden pedir aquรญ.
ยกLas tiras de pollo y las papas fritas estaban frescas y con el sazรณn perfecto! ยกY no escatiman en salsa! ยก100000/10, gracias por traer tan buen pollo al norte!

Kahit papaano, nakakadismaya ang apat na tray. Ang manok ay maitim, mapait, at lasa na parang pinirito sa lumang mantika. Ang crust ay napakatigasโna parang niluto kanina, iniwan na nakaupo, at pagkatapos ay ibinalik sa fryer. Wala tungkol dito ang sariwa, o kahit na malapit sa pamantayan ng Harold na kilala ko sa loob ng dalawang dekada.

Ang talagang nagpa-iling sa akin ay ang karamihan sa mga lokasyon ni Harold ay buong pagmamalaki na nagpapakita ng sikat na karatula: "Lahat ng mga order na niluto bago mag-order - 20 minuto o higit pa." Ito ay halos isang cultural landmark ni Harold sa puntong ito. Ngunit ang lokasyong ito ay dapat na muling nag-imbento ng slogan, dahil wala sa aming order ang nakatikim ng "fresh to order." Kung mayroon man, mas malasa itong "umupo ng 20 minuto o higit pa" bago pinainit.

Kumuha ako ng mga larawan dahil ang pagkakaiba sa pagitan ng batch na ito at kung ano ang dapat na hitsura ni Harold ay gabi at araw. Bilang isang taong patuloy na kumakain ng Harold's sa loob ng 20+ na taon, ito ang isa sa mga pinaka nakakadismaya na karanasan ni Harold na naranasan ko. Talagang inaasahan kong bumuti ang kalidad, dahil ang Avondale ay karapat-dapat na mas mahusay kaysa sa apat na tray ng sobrang luto, lipas na mga pakpak.

Matatagpuan sa isang digital food court, ngunit napakadaling i-order at kunin. Parehong FRESH at Flavorful ang manok at isda.

Isa sa mga pinakamahusay sa mga tuntunin ng panlasa at kaginhawahan sa lugar.

Sinubukan ko ang kanilang mga pakpak at hito sa dalawang magkahiwalay na okasyon at parehong may malalaking sukat ng bahagi at sinusunod ang orihinal na recipe upang pigilan ang pananabik ng Harold.

Umorder lang ako ng pagkain at humingi ng sarsa sa gilid.. sa halip ay hindi nila pinansin ang kahilingan ko at ang sarsa. Ito ang unang beses na natikman ko ang Harold's Chicken at hindi ko nagustuhan ang sinasabing pinakamasarap na bahagi.. ang sarsa. Masarap ang manok pero sobrang nadismaya. Pakitingnan ang iyong order kung umorder ka rito.
Ang mga malambot at fries ay sariwa at perpektong napapanahong OMG. Hindi rin sila madamot sa sauce! 100000/10, salamat sa pagdala ng magandang manok sa north side!

Sinasabing magsasara kayo ng 1pm... Papasok ako ng @12:22 sa isang Sabado at sinabi ng taong nagprito ng manok, tapos na kami. Habang nagpiprito siya ng manok... Sa kanto lang ako nakatira... At madalas pumunta dito... But this blew my mind that your door is open and I can walk in but you stop cooking 38 minutes early.... Hindi na ako babalik.... To be honest they don't deserve my money. Higit pa...

๐ฃ๐ฃ๐ฃ Itong Harold dito mismo sa gas station na ito ay MASARAP!!  Dahil wala na ang galit na babae, sinasagot pa ang mga phone ๐๐พ๐๐พ๐๐พ. Ang aking manok ay bagong handa, at sa paraang inorder ko ito! Kung naghahanap ka ng MASARAP na pagkain, ito ang lokasyong pupuntahan.

Ang huling karanasan ko sa Harold's ay noong ika-35 at Indiana ๐๐พ STRAIGHT TRASH. Huwag mong sayangin ang iyong pera.

Gusto ko ang lokasyon ni Harold! Para sa $20, maaari kang magpakain ng 2-4 ppl. Palagi akong nag-order ng dalawang kalahati ng madilim, at nagbibigay sila ng 2 piraso nang libre. 10pcs chicken yan, 6 slice bread, 3 coleslaw minis, at 3 servings ng fries. Gumagana ito!  kapag nagmamadali ka at kulang ang budget not to mention sunog ang pagkain!!!

Sinubukan ang lokasyong ito on the fly- napakasarap ng pagkain! Lahat ay sariwa! Pero sabi sa akin ng kaibigan ko nakalimutan nila ang paminta ko, pero first time dito natamaan!!! Gustung-gusto ang bawat bit ng aking 6 na pakpak na may fries!!! Tiyak na babalik, mangyaring ipagpatuloy ang mabuting gawain!

Tinanong ko ang kahera, "Pwede ba akong bumili ng ibang bangka na ginagamit nila para ilagay ang pagkain dahil umorder ako ng walong piraso na may banayad na sarsa, asin at paminta sa mga prito, at dagdag na lemon pepper lang sa manok." Sabi niya, "HINDI." "Hindi, hindi." "Ayoko kasi kung paano nila isinasalansan ang manok nila sa ibabaw ng mga prito at nilalagyan lang ng banayad na sarsa ang lahat." Pag-uwi ko, meron akong lapot na manok at gustong-gusto ko ang crispy chicken.

locations.name: Harold's Chicken Shack
locations.address: 8738 S Kedzie Ave, Evergreen Park, IL 60805, USA
reviews:
Cashier has bad attitudes and I waited 45mins for my order rib tips and after asking about why it took a long time "fheir putting the sauce on it and that took 10mins.
While I was standing at the counter watching and waiting I couldn't help but see the" Bottle of Patron" being distributed.  SERVICE TERRIBLE !!!
The rib tips okay sauce greasy

This is a sleeper Harolds. Not too many people realize how good this location is which is great because not as crowded as some of the other Harolds. When you tell them fried hard they fry your chicken hard. Would give them 5 stars but they still only doing cash payments which is old school but the food here is great.

This restaurant by the edible arrangement by 87th & Kedzie was horrible. My family is sick because the worker didn't "feel" like taking our order so the chicken was half done and the sauce was not portioned right on the ENTIRE MEAL. I don't usually leave these reviews but if you don't like your job find a new one. This is a business. Leave your "feelings" at the door or go to therapy. One of the WORST $55 I spent. I do not recommend going here at all. In stead of opening more franchises let's train on customer service and company value. Have a good one. Oh and I want a refund as well!

Every time we stop by at the Dunkin donuts next door we're always saying we're going to try this place. We ordered a 8 piece mixed with lemon pepper and hot sauce on the side. We waited about 30 minutes for the food which for me I think it's excessive for an 8 piece. Chicken was descent enough for me to want to order again but next time I will order ahead of time.

Food is always so good and fresh !!! The cook deserves a hug !!! You can tell he takes his time with cooking the food and itโs exactly like how you ask for it โฆ.. The cashiers are always so NICE. And professional . BEST one hands down !!!!

El cajero tiene mala actitud y esperรฉ 45 minutos por mi pedido de costillas. Despuรฉs de preguntar por quรฉ tardaban tanto en ponerles la salsa, tardรณ 10 minutos.
Mientras esperaba en el mostrador, no pude evitar ver cรณmo distribuรญan la "Botella de Patrรณn". ยกยกยกPรSIMO SERVICIO!!!
Las costillas estaban bien, la salsa estaba grasosa.

Este Harolds es una joya escondida. No mucha gente se da cuenta de lo bueno que es este local, lo cual es genial porque no estรก tan lleno como otros Harolds. Si pides el pollo bien frito, ยกlo frรญen bien! Les darรญa 5 estrellas, pero siguen aceptando solo efectivo, lo cual es un poco anticuado, pero la comida es buenรญsima.

Este restaurante de The Edible Arrangement en la esquina de la 87 y Kedzie fue horrible. Mi familia se enfermรณ porque el empleado no tenรญa ganas de tomar nuestro pedido, asรญ que el pollo estaba medio crudo y la salsa no estaba bien servida en toda la comida. Normalmente no dejo reseรฑas, pero si no te gusta tu trabajo, busca otro. Esto es un negocio. Deja tus "sentimientos" en la puerta o ve a terapia. Uno de los peores 55 dรณlares que he gastado. No recomiendo ir para nada. En lugar de abrir mรกs franquicias, capaciten a su personal en atenciรณn al cliente y valores empresariales. Que tengan un buen dรญa. ยกAh, y tambiรฉn quiero un reembolso!

Cada vez que pasamos por el Dunkin' Donuts de al lado, siempre decimos que vamos a probar este lugar. Pedimos un plato de 8 piezas con limรณn, pimienta y salsa picante aparte. Esperamos unos 30 minutos, lo cual me parece excesivo para un plato de 8 piezas. El pollo estaba tan bueno que me dieron ganas de volver a pedir, pero la prรณxima vez pedirรฉ con antelaciรณn.

Natutulog itong si Harolds. Hindi masyadong maraming tao ang nakakaalam kung gaano kaganda ang lokasyong ito na napakaganda dahil hindi kasing sikip ng ilan sa iba pang Harolds. Kapag sinabi mong pinirito nang husto ay piniprito nila ng husto ang manok mo. Would give them 5 stars but they still doing only cash payments which is old school pero ang sarap ng pagkain dito.

Ang restaurant na ito sa pamamagitan ng edible arrangement ni 87th & Kedzie ay kakila-kilabot. Ang aking pamilya ay may sakit dahil ang manggagawa ay hindi "naramdaman" na kunin ang aming order kaya ang manok ay kalahating tapos at ang sauce ay hindi nahati sa BUONG PAGKAIN. Hindi ko karaniwang iniiwan ang mga review na ito ngunit kung hindi mo gusto ang iyong trabaho maghanap ng bago. Ito ay isang negosyo. Iwanan ang iyong "mga damdamin" sa pintuan o pumunta sa therapy. Isa sa PINAKAMAHUSAY na $55 na ginastos ko. Hindi ko inirerekumenda ang pagpunta dito. Sa halip na magbukas ng mas maraming prangkisa, sanayin natin ang serbisyo sa customer at halaga ng kumpanya. Magkaroon ng magandang isa. Oh at gusto ko rin ng refund!

Tuwing dumaan kami sa Dunkin donuts sa tabi namin lagi naming sinasabi na susubukan namin ang lugar na ito. Umorder kami ng 8 piraso na may halong lemon pepper at mainit na sarsa sa gilid. We waited about 30 minutes for the food which for me I think it's excessive for an 8 piece. Chicken was descent enough para gusto kong umorder ulit pero next time mauuna na ako.

reviews: Food is very good here it's my go to place now for Harold's Chicken the best on the Southeast of Chicago on 98th and Torrence. The service is wonderful very polite not just saying this , if it wasn't I would say so. Theresa Jackson

If it were not for the couple chicken wings that didn't really look like wings, the food is great! I bought an 8 Wing but only 6 of them were completely edible. Those 6 wings though were cooked to perfection. Seasoned just right. I wish all plates looked like a plate they would personally eat.

Every time I come in here I have  a good experience! Just moved back to the city And initially was not coming here due to the location of it. Food was on point. You get everything you are supposed to get for a wing dinner. (Chicken, crinkle fries, bread and coleslaw) They put a good amount of sauce nothing is left dry. Chicken was fresh! Excellent portion size. I will be returning. Also exceptional customer service. Thank you for doing order number 34 on 9/7/25 the way itโs supposed to be done! I will be back. Compliments to you all, I felt like family.

To Management โฆTHANK YOU! Iโm back for an update on this location because they truly deserve it! Iโm grateful that I donโt have to always go outside of my community to get the great food experience I deserve!

Ang 3 wings ay 7.71 sinabi nila sa akin na 8 dollars kahit na hindi gaanong pagkakaiba ngunit tumaas ang mga presyo. Sinabi niya sa akin na maaari rin akong makakuha ng 4 na piraso para sa 10 dolyar kapag ang menu ay nagsasaad ng 8.50. Lagi silang huli sa pagkain at hindi nagbibigay ng lemon pepper. Binayaran ang 10 para sa aking 4 na pakpak. โค๏ธ Hindi na lang ako babalik o ire-refer muli ang lokasyong ito sa sinuman.
Mahilig silang magbenta ng mga nilutong rib tips! At huwag sagutin ang telepono, kaya hindi mo masabi sa kanila ang tungkol sa iyong order. Ang sariwa lang ay ang fries at under cooked smh.
I had a late night craving for Harold's and this hit the spot ๐ฅ I like how they add seasoning to the fries, I haven't seen that at other Harold's. Magagaling din ang mga lalaking nagtatrabaho doon

Ang batter ng manok ay napakahusay na tinimplahan ng lemon pepper ay may ganitong matamis ngunit limon na maalat na lasa. Napakasarap nito at kailangan mong ilagay ang banayad na sarsa para makuha ang banayad na sarsa. I'm so sorry wala akong mga litrato. Ito ay tulad ng sandaling nakuha ko ang manok at sumakay sa kotse. Literal na langhap ko ito habang nagmamaneho ako pabalik sa hotel room ko, so Harold do yโall thing.

Ito na ang pinakamasarap na Harolds na natikman ko.
Hindi lasang Harolds ang manok, parang niluto ko ito sa bahay. Napakalaki at tuyo ng dibdib.
Iba talaga ang banayad na sarsa ng fries kumpara sa banayad na sarsa na ibinigay sa akin sa gilid. Sana ma-upload ko pa ang order na sinayang ko at nasayang ko. Hindi na ako gagamit ulit ng Uber eats. Hindi nito sasabihin ang address ng Harolds BC. Hindi sana ako nag-oorder sa tindahang iyon. Siguro kaya wala silang nakakabit na numero ng kanilang tindahan.
Mag-ingat!!!!!!

locations.name: Harold's Chicken Shack
locations.address: 9151 S Ashland Ave, Chicago, IL 60620, USA
reviews: When I placed my order the cook was distracted by a phone call about his family members in Danville and selling their furniture. While listening to his call and the wait time for my order, I knew my order would be wrong!!! The woman that worked the register asked him what was the order in front of her and he said gizzard and wing combo. She informed him that it was a large gizzard and 6 wings he told her to just take the wings off!!! None the less my large gizzard is now a small gizzard I wanted them fried soft and they are hard as bricksโฆ. The cook had the nerve to open the door to tell me that a large gizzard come in a combo. I used to be a Harold's chicken addict. I could tell you which chicken shack had the best chicken, which one had the best gizzards. This chicken shack food I ordered on 5/5/25 was terrible. I should have had tacos. I ordered the chicken and gizzard combo with mild sauce. I was told 15 mins the food would be ready. When I got to my destination and opened the bag. I didn't know if they gave me a chicken or a Cornish hen wing. The wings were so small. The fries were half sized. My friend asked me,'Did they have any whole french fries?' I laughed. The gizzards were just ok. The two wings on the picture made its way to the garbage, along with some fries and gizzards. I don't have to return to this location. I know a bar that sells chicken wings and gizzards MUCH better than this Harold's.

To top it off the lady who took my order was outside smoking a cigarette and didnโt wash her hands when she returned. Luckily someone else came in and packed my chicken. This experience has been a first for this location but unfortunately I will not be patronizing this location ever again. Please do better Haroldโs chicken #4

At 5:17pm I got my food went to the car checked my order it was Loaded With Mild Sauce.. I took it back told them I have the wrong order they told me their ticket has mild sauce on it.  I showed the guy my Receipt that showed Salt & Pepper Only. They apologized and cooked me a new order unfortunately I didn't leave until 5:48= 1 Hour for food that had No Flavor. I was not Happy I don't think I'll be going back. I only waited b/c my Daughter said Mom it's gonna be Good NOT SO MUCH!!!

Nang mag-order ako, naagaw ng atensyon ng kusinero ang atensyon dahil sa isang tawag sa telepono tungkol sa mga kapamilya niya sa Danville at sa pagbebenta ng kanilang mga muwebles. Habang nakikinig sa tawag niya at sa tagal ng paghihintay sa order ko, alam kong mali ang order ko!!! Tinanong siya ng babaeng nag-iimpake kung ano ang order sa harap niya at sinabi niyang combo ng gizzard at wing. Sinabihan siya ng babae na malaking gizzard iyon at anim na pakpak. Sinabihan niya itong tanggalin na lang ang mga pakpak!!! Gayunpaman, ang malaking gizzard ko ay isa nang maliit na gizzard ngayon. Gusto ko sanang iprito nang malambot at matigas na parang ladrilyoโฆ. Naglakas-loob ang kusinero na buksan ang pinto para sabihin sa akin na may malaking gizzard na kasama sa combo. Walang refund at walang lulutuing muli kahit na magkamali sila sa order mo!!!!! Dati paborito ko 'yan pero hindi na ako babalik!!!!

Dati akong adik sa manok ni Harold. Masasabi ko na kung aling chicken shack ang may pinakamasarap na manok, alin ang may pinakamasarap na bakol. Napakasama ng pagkaing ito sa chicken shack na inorder ko noong 5/5/25. Dapat sana ay tacos ang kinain ko. Umorder ako ng chicken at bakol combo na may banayad na sarsa. Sinabihan ako na 15 minuto ay handa na ang pagkain. Pagdating ko sa destinasyon ko at binuksan ang bag, hindi ko alam kung manok o Cornish hen wing ang ibinigay nila sa akin. Napakaliit ng mga pakpak. Kalahating laki lang ang fries. Tinanong ako ng kaibigan ko, 'Mayroon ba silang buong french fries?' Natawa ako. Ok lang naman ang mga bakol. Napunta sa basurahan ang dalawang pakpak sa larawan, kasama ang ilang fries at bakol. Hindi ko na kailangang bumalik sa lugar na ito. May alam akong bar na nagbebenta ng chicken wings at bakol na MAS MASARAP kaysa sa Harold's na ito.

Aking mga tao, kailangan nating pagbutihin, huwag nating sabihing nagluluto tayo para mag-order at mag-refrigerate ng parehong mga pakpak na niluto mo kaninang umaga. I paid for 40 bucks for 16 wings and 2 hot peppers, I shouldโve checked my food but I was so hungry that I had ready to go home and eat. Nakarating ako sa kinaroroonan ko at binigyan nila ako ng lumang manok. To top it off ang babaeng kumuha ng order ko ay nasa labas na humihitit ng sigarilyo at hindi naghuhugas ng kamay nang bumalik siya. Buti na lang may pumasok at nag-impake ng manok ko. Ang karanasang ito ay naging una para sa lokasyong ito ngunit sa kasamaang-palad ay hindi ko na muling tatangkilikin ang lokasyong ito. Mangyaring pagbutihin ang manok ni Harold #4
Nakakain na kami ng lola ko ng manok nila nang 2-3 beses na ngayon. Ito na siguro ang pinakamasarap na Harold's na natikman ko sa loob ng maraming taon!

My Daughter said this place just re opened and they are REALLY GOOD. Huminto ako pagkatapos ng trabaho ngayon nag-order ako @4:49pm para sa 1/2 Reg Salt & Pepper Only.  At 5:17pm I got my food went to the car checked my order it was Loaded With Mild Sauce.. I took it back told them I have wrong order they told me their ticket has mild sauce on it.  Ipinakita ko sa lalaki ang aking Resibo na nagpapakita ng Salt & Pepper Only. Humingi sila ng tawad at pinagluto ako ng bagong order sa kasamaang palad hindi ako umalis hanggang 5:48= 1 Oras para sa pagkain na walang Flavor. I was not Happy Hindi ko akalaing babalik ako. I only waited b/c my Daughter said Mom it's gonna be Good NOT SO MUCH!!!
Mz.Buhangin
Koi

locations.name: Haroldโs Chicken & Sports Bar
locations.address: 16200 S Cicero Ave, Oak Forest, IL 60452, USA
reviews: The food was great! This is an actual Harold's Chicken Shack. They had a special of buy 6 wings get 6 wings free. They also serve drinks. I've been there before and the drinks weren't that good. This time the drinks were good. This is the best Harold's in this area.

Let me add this to the review.  On the menu they specifically say that it includes coleslaw.  I love coleslaw with barbecue.  I have never received coleslaw in my order at any time. I have been there.  This last time I did ask for coleslaw and I wanted them to make sure it was in my order.  It was not in my order.  If you want coleslaw make sure you ask for it and make sure they put it in there before you leave.  On the other hand, everything is fantastic. The chicken is awesome.  The service is great.  They cook it when you order.  Don't forget to ask for lunch specials if you're here before 2:00 pm.  The atmosphere here is great.  If you wish to dine in all the chairs are tall.  They have a mini slot machine section, make sure you're 21 if you use it.  The chicken is awesome!

Went to watch the Ravens and Green Bay game. Its a sports bar with no sports. The staff were kind. Ordered 6 wings to go instead, cost $14.29, took about 15 minutes. Fried and flavored very well! Feather included. Not bad or good just blah.

I enjoyed this spot the food was good all but the cole slaw.The service was good, however you can tell that he was overwhelmed. Because he had to handle the Uber eats and customer before him..

Now the music is a good idea however it was loud.We had to talk over the music and they were playing a lot of  unedited music. Which was a little much for me.I  love the idea of what they are trying to promote. Yes this could be a nice after work spot or even a birthday party space.

Invest in your business hire a extra help especially when it's football season you will attract more people of older age and maybe Sunday nights can be a old school night just before you getting ready to start the new week. Overall this Harold's Chicken has great potential of making a whole lot of money with  just with a few changes.

We threw a surprise bday party here on 7/12/25 and a time was had! The food was excellent, the service phenomenal and the atmosphere felt like home. We had a really great time. I appreciate all of the hard work the staff performed to make the party as great as it was. The ladies on the bar were on point and made sure everyone was served efficiently. Everyone was so nice and fun to work with. Thanks again!!!

ยกLa comida estuvo genial! Este es un autรฉntico Harold's Chicken Shack. Tenรญan una oferta especial: compra 6 alitas y llรฉvate 6 alitas gratis. Tambiรฉn sirven bebidas. Ya habรญa estado allรญ antes y las bebidas no estaban muy buenas. Esta vez sรญ que estaban buenas. Este es el mejor Harold's de la zona.

Permรญtanme aรฑadir esto a la reseรฑa. En el menรบ especifican que incluye ensalada de col. Me encanta la ensalada de col con barbacoa. Nunca me la han incluido en mi pedido. He ido varias veces. La รบltima vez que fui, pedรญ ensalada de col y me asegurรฉ de que la aรฑadieran a mi pedido. No estaba. Si quieren ensalada de col, asegรบrense de pedirla y de que la incluyan antes de irse. Por otro lado, todo lo demรกs es fantรกstico. El pollo estรก buenรญsimo. El servicio es excelente. Lo cocinan al momento. No olviden preguntar por los especiales del almuerzo si vienen antes de las 2:00 p. m. El ambiente es genial. Si desean comer allรญ, todas las sillas son altas. Tienen una pequeรฑa zona de mรกquinas tragamonedas; recuerden ser mayores de 21 aรฑos si las usan. ยกEl pollo estรก buenรญsimo!

Fui a ver el partido de los Ravens contra los Green Bay. Es un bar deportivo sin deportes. El personal fue amable. Pedรญ 6 alitas para llevar, que costaron $14.29 y tardaron unos 15 minutos. ยกFritas y con un sabor buenรญsimo! Incluye pluma. Ni mal ni bien, simplemente mediocre.

Disfrutรฉ de este lugar; la comida estaba buena, excepto la ensalada de col. El servicio fue bueno, pero se notaba que estaba abrumado, ya que tenรญa que atender a los clientes de Uber Eats y a los clientes que tenรญa delante.

La mรบsica es buena idea, pero estaba muy alta. Tuvimos que hablar por encima de la mรบsica y ponรญan mucha mรบsica sin editar. Lo cual fue un poco excesivo para mรญ. Me encanta la idea de lo que intentan promocionar. Sรญ, este podrรญa ser un buen lugar para despuรฉs del trabajo o incluso para una fiesta de cumpleaรฑos.

Invierte en tu negocio: contrata personal adicional, especialmente durante la temporada de fรบtbol. Atraerรกs a mรกs gente mayor y quizรกs los domingos por la noche puedas disfrutar de una noche de la vieja escuela justo antes de empezar la nueva semana. En general, este Harold's Chicken tiene un gran potencial para generar mucho dinero con solo unos pocos cambios.

Celebramos una fiesta de cumpleaรฑos sorpresa aquรญ el 12/7/25 y ยกlo pasamos genial! La comida estuvo excelente, el servicio fenomenal y el ambiente nos hizo sentir como en casa. Nos lo pasamos genial. Agradezco todo el esfuerzo del personal para que la fiesta fuera tan genial. Las chicas del bar estuvieron muy atentas y se aseguraron de que todos recibieran un servicio eficiente. Fueron muy amables y divertidos. ยกGracias de nuevo!

Ang sarap ng pagkain! Isa itong tunay na Harold's Chicken Shack. Mayroon silang espesyal na buy 6 wings, get 6 wings free. Naghahain din sila ng mga inumin. Nakapunta na ako roon dati at hindi ganoon kasarap ang mga inumin. Sa pagkakataong ito, masarap ang mga inumin. Ito ang pinakamasarap na Harold's sa lugar na ito.

Hayaan akong idagdag ito sa pagsusuri.  Sa menu ay partikular nilang sinasabi na may kasamang coleslaw.  Mahilig ako sa coleslaw na may barbecue.  Hindi pa ako nakatanggap ng coleslaw sa aking order anumang oras. nakapunta na ako dun.  Sa huling pagkakataon na humingi ako ng coleslaw at gusto kong tiyakin nila na nasa order ko ito.  Wala sa order ko.  Kung gusto mo ng coleslaw siguraduhin mong hilingin mo ito at siguraduhing ilagay nila ito doon bago ka umalis.  Sa kabilang banda, ang lahat ay hindi kapani-paniwala. Ang galing ng manok.  Ang serbisyo ay mahusay.  Nagluluto sila kapag nag-order ka.  Huwag kalimutang humingi ng mga espesyal na tanghalian kung nandito ka bago mag-2:00 pm.  Ang ganda ng atmosphere dito.  Kung gusto mong kumain sa lahat ng upuan ay matataas.  Mayroon silang seksyon ng mini slot machine, siguraduhing 21 ka kung gagamitin mo ito.  Ang galing ng manok!

Nanood ng laro ng Ravens at Green Bay. Isa itong sports bar na walang sports. Mababait ang mga staff. Umorder ako ng anim na wings para i-take out, nagkakahalaga ng $14.29, at inabot ng mga 15 minuto. Prito at masarap ang lasa! May kasama nang balahibo. Hindi naman masama o masarap, basta bla.

Nasiyahan ako sa lugar na ito ang pagkain ay masarap lahat maliban sa cole slaw.Maganda ang serbisyo, gayunpaman masasabi mong nabigla siya. Dahil kailangan niyang humawak ng mga pagkain at customer ng Uber bago siya..

Ngayon ang musika ay isang magandang ideya gayunpaman ito ay malakas. Kinailangan naming pag-usapan ang musika at nagpatugtog sila ng maraming hindi na-edit na musika. Which was a little much for me.I love the idea of โโwhat they are trying to promote. Oo, ito ay maaaring maging isang magandang lugar pagkatapos ng trabaho o kahit isang lugar para sa kaarawan.

Mamuhunan sa iyong negosyo umarkila ng dagdag na tulong lalo na kapag panahon ng football ay maaakit ka ng mas maraming mga taong may edad na at marahil ang Linggo ng gabi ay maaaring maging isang lumang gabi sa paaralan bago ka maghanda upang simulan ang bagong linggo. Sa pangkalahatan, ang Harold's Chicken na ito ay may malaking potensyal na kumita ng malaking pera sa pamamagitan lamang ng ilang pagbabago.

Nagdaos kami ng sorpresang birthday party dito noong 7/12/25 at talagang nag-enjoy kami! Napakasarap ng pagkain, napakaganda ng serbisyo, at parang nasa bahay lang ang kapaligiran. Nag-enjoy talaga kami. Pinahahalagahan ko ang lahat ng pagsisikap ng mga staff para maging kasingganda ng party. Napaka-tumutugon ng mga babae sa bar at sinigurado nilang maayos ang pagsisilbi sa lahat. Napakabait at nakakatuwang katrabaho ang lahat. Salamat ulit!!!

locations.name: Haroldโs Chicken
locations.address: 1711 E 87th St, Chicago, IL 60617, USA
reviews: If you like your food fresh don't be fooled by the $1 wing special. To get what you pay for! I rather pay more and waiting longer for better quality food. I should have known when I didn't smell the food being cooked and couldn't see any staff or the cashier. Every order was 10 mins.

I came in yesterday on a Friday night, my first-time & requested a half dark chicken with lemon pepper & 2 cans of soda which I ordered separately. I offered my condolences regarding the 55 year old female owner passing...the older female cashier working responded that she didn't know in a nonchalant manner & not a thank U on behalf of the company. I'm like wow... When I got my food 15 mins. later my food was salty with lemon pepper & it didn't even taste like Harold's Chicken either.

The chicken is fresh. I met the owner while I was there, and he was nice and professional.  He takes pride in his restaurant being clean and chicken fresh. It is in a somewhat sketchy neighborhood. However,  it's worth the trip.
I ordered a large gizzard and was extremely disappointed! The gizzards were awful! They had absolutely no taste, very small and hard, no seasoning! Harolds use to have a distinctive taste not these!

I ordered a 10 piece with lots of  sauce. They asked me if I wanted lemon pepper I said yes please. I pulled off and I opened up my bag and I saw that there was just a tiny squeeze of sauce on my chicken. Thatโs the whole reason of going to Haroldโs is to get the sauce and there was absolutely no lemon pepper. Why even ask if youโre not going to put it on there highly disappointed, highly dissatisfied want my money back. Place looks very random down and terrible and the inside

Si te gusta la comida fresca, no te dejes engaรฑar por la oferta de alitas a $1. ยกLo barato sale caro! Prefiero pagar mรกs y esperar mรกs por comida de mejor calidad. Debรญ sospechar cuando no olรญa a comida reciรฉn hecha y no vi a ningรบn empleado ni al cajero. Cada pedido tardaba 10 minutos.

Lleguรฉ ayer viernes por la noche, mi primera vez, y pedรญ un pollo semicurado con pimienta de limรณn y dos latas de refresco, que pedรญ por separado. Ofrecรญ mis condolencias por el fallecimiento de la dueรฑa, una mujer de 55 aรฑos... La cajera, de mayor edad, respondiรณ que no sabรญa nada con indiferencia, sin dar las gracias de parte de la empresa. Me quedรฉ como... ยกGuau!... Quince minutos despuรฉs, cuando me trajeron la comida, estaba salada por la pimienta de limรณn y ni siquiera sabรญa a pollo Harold's.

El pollo es fresco. Conocรญ al dueรฑo mientras estuve allรญ, y fue amable y profesional. Se enorgullece de que su restaurante sea limpio y el pollo fresco. Estรก en un barrio un poco peligroso. Sin embargo, vale la pena el viaje.

Pedรญ una molleja grande y me decepcionรณ muchรญsimo. ยกEstaban horribles! No tenรญan absolutamente ningรบn sabor, eran muy pequeรฑas y duras, ยกsin sazonar! Harolds solรญa tener un sabor distintivo, ยกpero estas no!

Pedรญ 10 piezas con mucha salsa. Me preguntaron si querรญa pimienta de limรณn y dije que sรญ, por favor. Me alejรฉ, abrรญ la bolsa y vi que solo habรญa un chorrito de salsa en el pollo. Esa es la razรณn principal por la que voy a Harold's: la salsa, y no habรญa pimienta de limรณn en absoluto. ยฟPara quรฉ preguntar si no la van a poner allรญ? Estoy muy decepcionado, muy insatisfecho, quiero que me devuelvan el dinero. El lugar se ve muy raro, horrible, y el interior...

Kung gusto mo ang iyong pagkain na sariwa, huwag magpalinlang sa $1 na espesyal na pakpak. Para makuha ang binabayaran mo! Mas gusto kong magbayad ng higit pa at maghintay ng mas matagal para sa mas mahusay na kalidad ng pagkain. Dapat alam ko nang hindi ko naamoy ang nilulutong pagkain at wala akong makitang staff o cashier. Bawat order ay 10 min.

Pumunta ako kahapon ng Biyernes ng gabi, ang unang beses ko rito at humiling ako ng kalahating dark chicken na may lemon pepper at dalawang lata ng soda na inorder ko nang hiwalay. Nakiramay ako sa pagpanaw ng 55 taong gulang na babaeng may-ari... Sumagot ang matandang babaeng cashier na hindi niya alam sa paraang walang pakialam at hindi nagpasalamat sa ngalan ng kumpanya. Namangha ako... Pagkalipas ng 15 minuto, pagkatanggap ko ng pagkain, maalat na may lemon pepper ang pagkain ko at hindi rin ito lasang Harold's Chicken.

Sariwa ang manok. Nakilala ko ang may-ari habang nandoon ako, at siya ay mabait at propesyonal.  Ipinagmamalaki niya ang kanyang restaurant na malinis at sariwang manok. Ito ay nasa isang medyo malabo na kapitbahayan. Gayunpaman, sulit ang paglalakbay.
Umorder ako ng malaking baul at labis akong nadismaya! Ang pangit ng mga baul! Wala silang lasa, napakaliit at matigas, walang pampalasa! Dati, kakaiba ang lasa ng Harolds, hindi ang mga ito!

Umorder ako ng 10 piece na maraming sauce. Tinanong nila ako kung gusto ko ng lemon pepper I said yes please. I pulled off and I opened up my bag and I saw that there was just a little squeeze of sauce on my chicken. Iyon ang buong dahilan ng pagpunta sa Harold's ay upang makakuha ng sarsa at talagang walang lemon pepper. Bakit mo pa tatanungin kung hindi mo ito ilalagay doon na sobrang bigo, hindi nasisiyahan, gusto kong ibalik ang pera ko. Lugar mukhang napaka-random down at kakila-kilabot at ang loob

Medyo hindi naluto nang maayos ang mga baul. Ok naman ang serbisyo, medyo nag-aalangan siguro kung susubukan ulit nila at sasabihing iprito nang matigas.
Lagi nilang nakahanda ang mga pickup order para pumunta sa tamang oras. Salamat dito wala akong pakialam na maghintay ngunit ang oras ay pera. Walang mga isyu sa nawawalang mga item.

Nasiyahan ako sa pagsubok ni Harold ngayon. Ako ay nag-aalinlangan dahil sa mga mas lumang mga review ngunit sa sandaling nakita ko na ito ay sa ilalim ng bagong pamamahala nagpasya akong subukan ito at natutuwa akong ginawa ko ito! Ako ay lubos na humanga sa serbisyo sa customer. Mula sa tawag sa telepono kung saan ko inilagay ang aking order hanggang sa aking serbisyo noong kinuha ko ito ay kahanga-hanga. Sila ay masayahin at sabik na tumulong. Baby then I got home and tried my food! It was Hot and Fresh, Tama ang sauce at tama ang order ko! ๐๐พ๐๐พ๐๐พ Talagang nakakuha kayo ng bagong customer sa akin. Salamat ulit!
Naglalaro at pinagtatawanan ka ng mga empleyado mula sa kusina. Pinapipindot ka nila ng service bell, at tumatawa lang sila at nagkukwentuhan ng mga pangungutya.
