locations.name: Harold's Chicken Shack Evanston
locations.address: 337 W Howard St, Evanston, IL 60202, USA
reviews:
I don't eat takeout nearly as much as I did pre-COVID so I'm not ordering from here as much. But when I do get a craving for takeout (usually no more than once a month), Harold's French fries with mild sauce and fried mushrooms is often what I want. I ordered from here yesterday, and per usual, these two items did not disappoint.

I've been inside of here MANY times. I like it. I didn't always see people wearing masks during COVID-19, but the one lady (sorta long bob with highlights, I think) who called everybody "sweetie/sweetheart" was so pleasant that I let it slide. I don't know where she is now. I've seen two other women post-COVID who look like they'd rather be anywhere else, but I liked THAT lady. She was the epitome of good vibes. All the guys I've encountered were friendly too. One gave me the nickname "Sides" because he caught on that I never order chicken or fish. (Vegetarian.) I haven't seen him in a long time either.

I would normally give this place 5 stars for the fries, mushrooms and those two, but I ordered cheese sticks that were clearly not cooked. The cheese was cold. The breaded part was lukewarm. It tasted like somebody defrosted them and just put them in the bag. I've gotten cheese sticks from there a number of times, and they were always coked well. Getting marinara sauce was only about 10% of the time though. They are always out.

That's the only reason I'm knocking a couple of stars off. I've yet to figure out how to make fried mushrooms as perfectly as they do. I've tried and failed, and then I order from the experts. So, it's not always perfect in there but I still like it.

First time here and everything was good from the service to the food !! If youโre familiar with Haroldโs you already know that EACH one is different. This one was good . I got a 4 wing dinner with hot sauce on everything. My only slight issue was coleslaw was a little juicy but still good !! If youโre in the area I would suggest stopping by .

Canadian here. Heard great things about Haroldโs. :(
The chicken was salty. :( the liver was very livery (but i dont like liver so my 3 stars are just for the chicken and fries and cat fish) the fries were food. The cat fish I enjoyed!
It took about 30+ minutes to get our foodโฆ.. i drove there.( which i didnt understand since doordash says you get it in 10?)
The person who took our order was friendly and helpful.
๐ข

Everyone always talks about Haroldโs Chicken! So I wanted to check them out for myself. I went with some friends to finally check them out. And I ordered the 6 piece chicken wings with mild sauce and a 4 piece chicken wing with lemon pepper. I requested that the wings be fried hard, and the wings were pretty good. I tried the French Fries. They were just okay. But overall Iโm glad I went . The wings were tasty!!

I grew up on Harold's Chicken. It is a continued favorite in my family. However, today's order at the Evanston Howard location was an unfortunate dining experience. The Cook was half an hour late. Once, I finally got my 6 wings and fries, one of the wings was completely black!  Not burnt, but BLACK!! Looked dangerous and or diseased! This took all the joy away. from enjoying the rest of my meal. I also want to mention that the nice young lady who took my order and seasoned my food was GREAT! I didn't take back the BLACK wing bc ( let's face it) I am sure they would not have provided a customer friendly remedy. This is verified by all the handwritten signs they have posted in the restaurant (i.e. check your food before you leave...). I was not happy with this visit. If there is a next visit, I will open the bag and check every EVERYTHING!!! I am sadden it has come down to this!!

Ya no como comida para llevar tanto como antes de la COVID, asรญ que ya no pido tanto aquรญ. Pero cuando me apetece (normalmente no mรกs de una vez al mes), suelo pedir las patatas fritas con salsa suave y champiรฑones fritos de Harold. Pedรญ aquรญ ayer y, como siempre, estos dos platos no me decepcionaron.

He estado aquรญ MUCHAS veces. Me gusta. No siempre vi a gente con mascarilla durante la COVID-19, pero la seรฑora (con el pelo medio largo y mechas, creo) que llamaba a todo el mundo "cariรฑo" era tan amable que lo dejรฉ pasar. No sรฉ dรณnde estarรก ahora. He visto a otras dos mujeres despuรฉs de la COVID que parecen preferir estar en cualquier otro sitio, pero esa seรฑora me cayรณ bien. Era la personificaciรณn del buen rollo. Todos los chicos con los que me he topado tambiรฉn eran amables. Uno me puso el apodo de "Sides" porque se dio cuenta de que nunca pido pollo ni pescado. (Vegetariano). Yo tampoco lo he visto en mucho tiempo.

Normalmente le darรญa 5 estrellas a este lugar por las papas fritas, los champiรฑones y esos dos, pero pedรญ palitos de queso que claramente no estaban hechos. El queso estaba frรญo. La parte empanizada estaba tibia. Sabรญa como si alguien los hubiera descongelado y simplemente los hubiera metido en la bolsa. He pedido palitos de queso de allรญ varias veces, y siempre estaban bien hechos. Sin embargo, solo pedรญ salsa marinara el 10% de las veces. Siempre falta.

Esa es la รบnica razรณn por la que le quito un par de estrellas. Todavรญa no he descubierto cรณmo hacer champiรฑones fritos tan perfectos como ellos. Lo he intentado y he fracasado, y luego pido a los expertos. Asรญ que no siempre estรก perfecto, pero aun asรญ me gusta.

Primera vez aquรญ y todo estuvo genial, ยกdesde el servicio hasta la comida! Si conoces Harold's, ya sabes que cada uno es diferente. Este estaba muy bueno. Pedรญ una cena de cuatro alitas con salsa picante en todo. Mi รบnico pequeรฑo detalle fue que la ensalada de col estaba un poco jugosa, ยกpero aรบn asรญ estaba rica! Si estรกs por la zona, te recomiendo que te pases.

Soy canadiense. He oรญdo hablar muy bien de Harold's. :(
El pollo estaba salado. :( El hรญgado estaba muy salado (pero no me gusta el hรญgado, asรญ que mis 3 estrellas son solo para el pollo, las patatas fritas y el bagre). Las patatas fritas eran la comida. ยกEl bagre me encantรณ!
Tardaron mรกs de 30 minutos en traernos la comida... fui en coche. (Lo cual no entendรญ, ya que DoorDash dice que la comida llega en 10 minutos).
La โโpersona que nos tomรณ el pedido fue amable y servicial.
๐ข

ยกTodo el mundo habla de Harold's Chicken! Asรญ que quise probarlo yo mismo. Fui con unos amigos para probarlo por fin. Pedรญ las alitas de pollo de 6 piezas con salsa suave y una de 4 piezas con pimienta y limรณn. Pedรญ que las alitas estuvieran bien fritas, y estaban bastante buenas. Probรฉ las papas fritas. Estaban bien. Pero en general, me alegro de haber ido. ยกLas alitas estaban deliciosas!

Crecรญ con Harold's Chicken. Sigue siendo un favorito en mi familia. Sin embargo, el pedido de hoy en el restaurante Evanston Howard fue una experiencia desagradable. El cocinero llegรณ media hora tarde. Una vez, cuando finalmente recibรญ mis seis alitas y papas fritas, ยกuna estaba completamente negra! No quemada, ยกsino NEGRA! ยกSe veรญa peligrosa o enferma! Esto me quitรณ toda la alegrรญa de disfrutar el resto de mi comida. Tambiรฉn quiero mencionar que la amable seรฑorita que tomรณ mi pedido y me aliรฑรณ fue EXCELENTE. No devolvรญ el alita NEGRA porque (seamos sinceros) estoy seguro de que no habrรญan ofrecido una soluciรณn amigable. Esto se confirma con todos los letreros escritos a mano que tienen en el restaurante (por ejemplo, revisen su comida antes de irse...). No quedรฉ contento con esta visita. Si vuelvo, abrirรฉ la bolsa y revisarรฉ TODO. ยกMe entristece que haya llegado a esto!

Zamรณwiลem 4 skrzydeลka z ostrym sosem do wszystkiego. Jedynym maลym minusem byลa surรณwka, ktรณra byลa trochฤ soczysta, ale i tak dobra! Jeลli jesteล w okolicy, polecam wpaลฤ.

Jestem Kanadyjczykiem. Sลyszaลem ลwietne rzeczy o Harold's. :(
Kurczak byล sลony. :( Wฤtrรณbka byลa bardzo sลona (ale nie lubiฤ wฤtrรณbki, wiฤc moje 3 gwiazdki liczฤ siฤ tylko za kurczaka, frytki i suma). Frytki byลy pyszne. Suma mi smakowaลa!
Zajฤลo nam ponad 30 minut, ลผeby dostaฤ nasze jedzenieโฆ pojechaลem tam (czego nie zrozumiaลem, bo Doordash twierdzi, ลผe dostawa trwa 10 minut?).
Osoba, ktรณra przyjmowaลa nasze zamรณwienie, byลa miลa i pomocna.
๐ข

Hindi ako kumakain ng takeout nang kasing dami ng dati bago ang COVID kaya hindi ako masyadong nag-oorder dito. Pero kapag nag-crave ako ng takeout (karaniwan ay hindi hihigit sa isang beses sa isang buwan), madalas kong gusto ang French fries ni Harold na may mild sauce at pritong mushroom. Umorder ako dito kahapon, at gaya ng dati, hindi ako nabigo sa dalawang item na ito.

Maraming beses na akong nakapunta rito. Gusto ko ito. Hindi ko laging nakikitang may mga taong nakasuot ng mask noong COVID-19, pero yung isang babae (medyo mahaba ang bob na may highlights, sa palagay ko) na tumatawag sa lahat ng "sweetie/sweetheart" ay napakabait kaya hinayaan ko na lang. Hindi ko alam kung nasaan siya ngayon. May nakita akong dalawa pang babae pagkatapos ng COVID na mukhang mas gusto nilang pumunta sa ibang lugar, pero gusto ko ang babaeng IYON. Siya ang huwaran ng good vibes. Lahat ng mga lalaking nakilala ko ay palakaibigan din. Ang isa ay nagbigay sa akin ng palayaw na "Sides" dahil naintindihan niya na hindi ako nag-oorder ng manok o isda. (Vegetarian.) Matagal ko na rin siyang hindi nakikita.

Karaniwan kong binibigyan ang lugar na ito ng 5 bituin para sa fries, mushroom at sa dalawa, pero umorder ako ng cheese sticks na malinaw na hindi pa luto. Malamig ang keso. Malamig ang breading part. Parang may nag-defrost at nilagay lang sa bag. Nakakuha na ako ng cheese sticks mula roon nang ilang beses, at lagi silang naluto nang maayos. Pero mga 10% lang ng oras ang nakukuha kong marinara sauce. Lagi silang wala.

Iyon lang ang dahilan kung bakit ako nakakakuha ng ilang bituin. Hindi ko pa alam kung paano gumawa ng pritong mushroom nang kasing perpekto ng ginagawa nila. Sinubukan ko na at nabigo, at pagkatapos ay umorder ako mula sa mga eksperto. Kaya, hindi laging perpekto doon pero gusto ko pa rin ito.

First time here and everything was good from the service to the food!! Kung pamilyar ka sa Harold's alam mo na ang BAWAT isa ay iba. Ang isang ito ay mabuti. Kumuha ako ng 4 wing dinner na may mainit na sarsa sa lahat. Ang kaunting isyu ko lang ay ang coleslaw ay medyo makatas ngunit maganda pa rin !! Kung ikaw ay nasa lugar na iminumungkahi kong dumaan sa .

Canadian dito. Nakarinig ng magagandang bagay tungkol kay Harold. :(
Ang manok ay maalat. :( sobrang livery ang atay (pero i dont like liver so my 3 stars are just for the chicken and fries and cat fish) food ang fries. Yung cat fish na enjoy ko!
Tumagal ng humigit-kumulang 30+ minuto upang makuha ang aming pagkainโฆ.. nagmaneho ako roon.(na hindi ko naintindihan dahil sinabi ng doordash na makukuha mo ito sa 10?)
Magiliw at matulungin ang taong kumuha ng aming order.
๐ข

Laging pinag-uusapan ng lahat ang Harold's Chicken! Kaya gusto ko silang subukan mismo. Sumama ako sa ilang kaibigan para subukan din. At umorder ako ng 6 na piraso ng chicken wings na may banayad na sarsa at 4 na piraso ng chicken wing na may lemon pepper. Hiniling ko na iprito nang husto ang mga pakpak, at masarap naman ang mga pakpak. Sinubukan ko ang French Fries. Okay lang naman. Pero sa pangkalahatan, natutuwa akong pumunta ako. Masarap ang mga pakpak!!

Lumaki ako sa Harold's Chicken. Ito ay patuloy na paborito sa aking pamilya. Gayunpaman, ang order ngayon sa lokasyon ng Evanston Howard ay isang hindi magandang karanasan sa kainan. The Cook was half an hour late. Minsan, sa wakas nakuha ko na ang 6 na pakpak at fries ko, ang isa sa mga pakpak ay ganap na itim!  Hindi nasunog, kundi ITIM!! Mukhang mapanganib at o may sakit! Inalis nito ang lahat ng kagalakan. mula sa pag-enjoy sa natitirang pagkain ko. Gusto ko ring banggitin na ang magaling na binibini na kumuha ng aking order at tinimplahan ang aking pagkain ay GRABE! Hindi ko binawi ang BLACK wing bc ( aminin na natin) I am sure hindi sila magbibigay ng customer friendly na remedy. Ito ay na-verify ng lahat ng sulat-kamay na mga karatula na kanilang nai-post sa restaurant (ibig sabihin, suriin ang iyong pagkain bago ka umalis...). Hindi ako natuwa sa pagbisitang ito. Kung may susunod na pagbisita, bubuksan ko ang bag at suriin ang bawat LAHAT!!! Nalulungkot ako na umabot sa ganito!!

เคเคธเฅ เคตเคเคน เคธเฅ เคฎเฅเค เคฆเฅ เคธเฅเคเคพเคฐ เคเคฎ เคฆเฅ เคฐเคนเคพ เคนเฅเคเฅค เคฎเฅเคเฅ เคเคญเฅ เคคเค เคฏเคน เคธเคฎเค เคจเคนเฅเค เคเคฏเคพ เคนเฅ เคเคฟ เคเคจเคเฅ เคเฅเคธเฅ เคชเคฐเคซเฅเคเฅเค เคซเฅเคฐเคพเคเคก เคฎเคถเคฐเฅเคฎ เคเฅเคธเฅ เคฌเคจเคพเค เคเคพเคคเฅ เคนเฅเคเฅค เคฎเฅเคเคจเฅ เคเฅเคถเคฟเคถ เคเฅ, เคฒเฅเคเคฟเคจ เคจเคพเคเคพเคฎ เคฐเคนเคพ, เคเคฐ เคซเคฟเคฐ เคฎเฅเคเคจเฅ เคเคเฅเคธเคชเคฐเฅเคเฅเคธ เคธเฅ เคเคฐเฅเคกเคฐ เคเคฟเคฏเคพเฅค เคคเฅ, เคตเคนเคพเค เคเคพ เคเคพเคจเคพ เคนเคฎเฅเคถเคพ เคชเคฐเคซเฅเคเฅเค เคจเคนเฅเค เคนเฅเคคเคพ, เคฒเฅเคเคฟเคจ เคซเคฟเคฐ เคญเฅ เคฎเฅเคเฅ เคชเคธเคเคฆ เคนเฅเฅค

เคฏเคนเคพเค เคชเคนเคฒเฅ เคฌเคพเคฐ เคเคฏเคพ เคเคฐ เคธเฅเคตเคพ เคธเฅ เคฒเฅเคเคฐ เคเคพเคจเฅ เคคเค, เคธเคฌ เคเฅเค เคเคเฅเคเคพ เคฅเคพ!! เคเคเคฐ เคเคช เคนเฅเคฐเฅเคฒเฅเคกเฅเคธ เคธเฅ เคชเคฐเคฟเคเคฟเคค เคนเฅเค, เคคเฅ เคเคช เคเคพเคจเคคเฅ เคนเฅ เคนเฅเคเคเฅ เคเคฟ เคนเคฐ เคเค เคเคฒเค เคนเฅเคคเคพ เคนเฅเฅค เคฏเคน เคตเคพเคฒเคพ เคเคเฅเคเคพ เคฅเคพเฅค เคฎเฅเคเฅ เคนเคฐ เคเฅเคเคผ เคชเคฐ เคคเฅเคเฅ เคธเฅเคธ เคเฅ เคธเคพเคฅ 4 เคตเคฟเคเค เคตเคพเคฒเคพ เคกเคฟเคจเคฐ เคฎเคฟเคฒเคพเฅค เคฌเคธ เคฅเฅเคกเคผเฅ เคธเฅ เคฆเคฟเคเฅเคเคค เคฏเคน เคฅเฅ เคเคฟ เคเฅเคฒเคธเฅเคฒเฅ เคฅเฅเคกเคผเคพ เคฐเคธเฅเคฒเคพ เคฅเคพ, เคฒเฅเคเคฟเคจ เคซเคฟเคฐ เคญเฅ เคเคเฅเคเคพ เคฅเคพ!! เคเคเคฐ เคเคช เคเคธ เคเคฒเคพเคเฅ เคฎเฅเค เคนเฅเค, เคคเฅ เคฎเฅเค เคเคชเคเฅ เคฏเคนเคพเค เคฐเฅเคเคจเฅ เคเคพ เคธเฅเคเคพเคต เคฆเฅเคเคเคพเฅค

locations.name: Harold's Chicken On Clinton
locations.address: 115 S Clinton St, Chicago, IL 60661, USA
reviews: Outstanding service.  The Chicken is always piping hot and fresh.  Ordering takes about 15 minutes.  They have also set up cameras so you can see your meal being prepared.  I will never again go to another chicken place in the area.  They also have lunch specials from 10am-4pm, Monday through Saturday.
this place is CLOSED...idk why Google still has it listed

worst experience ever. long wait, bland dry chicken, somewhat over cooked, no sides of sauce so the tiny bit they put on was it, which you didnโt get any flavor from, and the long wait was fine until it seemed our food had been sitting for quite awhile before we got it. was recommended from someone who used to live in chicago but that was the worst chicken spot experience iโve ever had.
It's shut down. Don't waste your time
Very good. Ordered the 1/4 white dinner and food was fried to perfection and the restaurant was clean. Will return after Lent.

Natitirang serbisyo.  Ang Manok ay laging mainit at sariwa.  Ang pag-order ay tumatagal ng humigit-kumulang 15 minuto.  Nag-set up din sila ng mga camera para makita mo ang iyong pagkain na inihahanda.  Hindi na ako pupunta sa ibang lugar ng manok sa lugar.  Mayroon din silang mga espesyal na tanghalian mula 10am-4pm, Lunes hanggang Sabado.

Pinakamasamang karanasan kailanman. Mahabang paghihintay, walang lasang tuyong manok, medyo naluto nang sobra, walang sawsawan kaya ang kaunting sarsa na nilagyan nila ay iyon na lang, na hindi mo naman nalalasahan, at ayos lang ang mahabang paghihintay hanggang sa tila medyo matagal na rin ang pagkain namin bago namin ito natanggap. Inirekomenda ito mula sa isang dating nakatira sa Chicago pero iyon ang pinakamasamang karanasan sa chicken spot na naranasan ko.

locations.address: 13653 S Cicero Ave, Crestwood, IL 60445, USA
reviews: My friends and I visit this location on 10/25/25. Great service from Jamie if I remember that was the bartender/server name. She was 100% awesome the only bartender there. Everything was going great DJ awesome and all. We had been there for about 1 hour or 2 before the cook walked off the job before fulfilling the entire party food order. Jamie didnt show any sign of stress she kept it together and kept apologizing the other guy(comedian)forgot his name was a big help. The security guard stepped in as well, the all kept my friends and myself informed and called in someone to come finish cooking for us whom never received our order. Our food wasn't as pleasant as our other friends but they tried their best to keep us satisfied. I just wanna thank Jamie and the rest of the crew for keeping it professional while keeping us all satisfiedโค๏ธsee you on 11/15 Jamie & Crew

Bumisita kami ng aking mga kaibigan sa lokasyong ito sa 10/25/25. Great service from Jamie if I remember that was the bartender/server name. Siya ay 100% kahanga-hanga ang nag-iisang bartender doon. Si Jamie ay hindi nagpakita ng anumang senyales ng stress ay pinananatili niya ito at patuloy na humihingi ng tawad sa ibang lalaki(comedian)nakalimutan ang kanyang pangalan ay isang malaking tulong. Pumasok na rin ang security guard, pinaalam ng lahat ang aking mga kaibigan at ang aking sarili at tinawag ang isang tao na dumating upang tapusin ang pagluluto para sa amin na hindi natanggap ang aming order. Ang aming pagkain ay hindi kasing kaaya-aya ng aming iba pang mga kaibigan ngunit sinubukan nila ang kanilang makakaya upang mapanatili kaming mabusog. Gusto ko lang pasalamatan si Jamie at ang iba pang crew sa pagpapanatiling propesyonal habang pinapanatiling nasisiyahan kaming lahatโค๏ธsee you on 11/15 Jamie & Crew

reviews: Ordered through Uber eats on a Wednesday at 12:00 pm. (2) 1/2 dark specials and (1) 1/2 white. First off, it was a plain white bagโฆno Haroldโs original bag. The food arrived hot and the sauce was evenly spread, but the meat did not taste right. It was very very tough and not fried hard like I asked. I thought I was ordering from 127th and halsted. Never will eat here again.

I went to Haroldโs in Dolton today to pick up an online order.  The lady behind the counter was rude and rolling her eyes. I told her Thank you and she never responded. Rolled her eyes and walked away.  I will not be going back to this Harold's.

Chicken was dark like it was cooked in bad grease. As a matter of fact Iโm sure it was.. Straight up nastyโฆ You guys should be ashamed of yourselves.. This is Not a Real Haroldโsโฆsomeone should report this to corporate!

I rarely give 5 stars. But I have to give them their credit ! I got 6 wings with EXTRA mild sauce ( true Chicagoan) and it was amazing. It was so fresh and the mild sauce was perfect. Very impressed also that I ordered it from Uber eats and it was still very hot.
The food was hot but it definitely doesn't taste like "harolds" definitely don't recommend this location.

Pedรญ por Uber Eats un miรฉrcoles a las 12:00. (2) mitades de carne negra y (1) mitad blanca. Para empezar, era una bolsa blanca normalโฆ no la bolsa original de Harold's. La comida llegรณ caliente y la salsa estaba bien distribuida, pero la carne no tenรญa el sabor adecuado. Estaba muy dura y no estaba bien frita como pedรญ. Pensรฉ que estaba pidiendo en la calle 127 y Halsted. Nunca volverรฉ a comer aquรญ.

Hoy fui a Harold's en Dolton a recoger un pedido en lรญnea. La seรฑora detrรกs del mostrador fue grosera y puso los ojos en blanco. Le dije "gracias" y no respondiรณ. Puso los ojos en blanco y se fue. No volverรฉ a este Harold's.

El pollo estaba oscuro, como si lo hubieran cocinado con grasa de mala calidad. De hecho, estoy seguro de que sรญ... Simplemente asqueroso... Deberรญan estar avergonzados... Este no es un Harold's de verdad... ยกAlguien deberรญa informar de esto a la empresa!

Rara vez doy 5 estrellas, ยกpero esta vez se lo merecรญan! Pedรญ 6 alitas con salsa extra suave (al mรกs puro estilo de Chicago) y estaban increรญbles. Fresquรญsimas y la salsa suave en su punto. Me impresionรณ mucho que, a pesar de haberlas pedido por Uber Eats, llegaran bien calientes.
La comida estaba caliente, pero definitivamente no sabe a "Harolds". Definitivamente no recomiendo este lugar.

Na-order sa pamamagitan ng mga pagkain sa Uber tuwing Miyerkules ng 12:00 pm. (2) 1/2 dark specials at (1) 1/2 white. Una, ito ay isang simpleng puting bag...walang orihinal na bag ni Harold. Dumating na mainit ang pagkain at pantay-pantay ang pagkalat ng sarsa, ngunit hindi tama ang lasa ng karne. Ito ay napaka-matigas at hindi pinirito nang husto tulad ng hiniling ko. Akala ko nag-order ako mula sa ika-127 at huminto. Hindi na ulit kakain dito.

Pumunta ako sa Harold's sa Dolton ngayon para kumuha ng online order. Bastos at umirap ang babae sa likod ng counter. Sinabihan ko siyang "Salamat" pero hindi na siya sumagot. Umirap ako at naglakad palayo. Hindi na ako babalik sa Harold's na ito.

Maitim ang manok na parang niluto sa masamang mantika. Kung tutuusin, sigurado ako na.. Makulit talaga... Dapat mahiya kayo sa inyong sarili.. This is Not a Real Harold's...may mag-ulat nito sa corporate!

Bihira akong magbigay ng 5 star. Ngunit kailangan kong ibigay sa kanila ang kanilang kredito! Nakakuha ako ng 6 na pakpak na may EXTRA mild sauce (totoong Chicagoan) at ito ay kamangha-manghang. Napakapresko nito at perpekto ang mild sauce. Very impressed din na nag-order ako sa Uber eats at napakainit pa rin.

reviews: am so glad this location opened upโitโs great to have them relatively close! While the wait for food can be longer than at some of the less desirable spots nearby, the quality makes it well worth it. The chicken is consistently fresh, hot, and delicious. Itโs definitely a Southwest Side gem!

First time I had ever gone inside this business, 2 patrons were watching a football game on the business TV. The cashier told me my food would be about another 5 minutes. Food was tasty. Packing lot is small.

This is my favorite spot- itโs clean and everything is super fresh. Inside is super clean. I usually call ahead to order and itโs ready within 15-20 minutes. Small/shared parking lot, but what I love about this spot is it has a DRIVE THRU so I can pull up when the food is ready! Kayla is super friendly and professional. Always coming here!!

Dec.5 2025 I've been patronizing this place ever since it's been open. I deleted my five star. I come there once or twice a week after work phone order person is rude and this is not the first time. I ordered a 10 wing with light sauce chicken was not freshly cooked and old fries with just a few drops of barbecue sauce on it. Will not be patronizing anymore.

We experienced poor customer service. Cashier was very rude both over the phone and in person. We placed our order by phone but still had to wait about 20 minutes after arriving to pick it up. I had requested extra sauce, but there was barely any on my food. When I asked for more, the employee insisted it was already in the bag โ however, there was no sauce in the bag at all. This was disappointing and not the level of service we expected.

Me alegra mucho que este local haya abierto; ยกes genial tenerlo relativamente cerca! Aunque la espera para la comida puede ser mรกs larga que en otros lugares menos populares de la zona, la calidad lo vale. El pollo siempre estรก fresco, caliente y delicioso. ยกSin duda, es una joya del suroeste!

Natutuwa akong nagbukas ang lokasyong itoโnakakatuwa na medyo malapit lang sila! Bagama't maaaring mas matagal ang paghihintay para sa pagkain kaysa sa ilang mga hindi gaanong kanais-nais na lugar sa malapit, sulit naman ang kalidad nito. Ang manok ay palaging sariwa, maanghang, at masarap. Isa itong tunay na hiyas ng Southwest Side!

Sa unang pagkakataon na nakapasok ako sa negosyong ito, may dalawang parokyano na nanonood ng laro ng football sa business TV. Sinabi sa akin ng kahera na aabutin pa ng limang minuto ang pagkain ko. Masarap ang pagkain. Maliit lang ang balot.

Ito ang paborito kong lugar- ito ay malinis at lahat ay sobrang sariwa. Super linis sa loob. Karaniwan akong tumatawag nang maaga upang mag-order at handa na ito sa loob ng 15-20 minuto. Maliit/shared na parking lot, pero ang gusto ko sa lugar na ito ay may DRIVE THRU ito para makaalis ako kapag handa na ang pagkain! Kayla is super friendly and professional. Laging pumupunta dito!!

Dis.5 2025 Tinatangkilik ko ang lugar na ito mula nang ito ay bukas. Tinanggal ko ang five star ko. Pumupunta ako doon minsan o dalawang beses sa isang linggo pagkatapos ng trabaho ang taong nag-order ng telepono ay bastos at hindi ito ang unang pagkakataon. Umorder ako ng 10 wing na may light sauce na hindi bagong luto ang manok at mga lumang fries na may konting patak lang ng barbecue sauce. Hindi na magtatangkilik.

Nakaranas kami ng mahinang serbisyo sa customer. Napakabastos ng cashier sa telepono at sa personal. Inilagay namin ang aming order sa pamamagitan ng telepono ngunit kailangan pa ring maghintay ng mga 20 minuto pagkatapos dumating upang kunin ito. Humiling ako ng dagdag na sarsa, ngunit halos wala sa aking pagkain. Nang humingi ako ng higit pa, iginiit ng empleyado na nasa bag na ito โ gayunpaman, wala talagang sauce sa bag. Ito ay nakakabigo at hindi ang antas ng serbisyo na aming inaasahan.

locations.name: Harold's Chicken shack
locations.address: 1126 S Grand Ave E, Springfield, IL 62703, USA
reviews:
Update 5 stars to 2: After almost 2 months in operation this restaurant has been came a typical Springfield restaurant. Serving cold food, incorrect orders at a rate of 50% to 75% and non-existent customer service.  They put hot meat on top of cold fries. They constantly do not put sauce on orders. Sauce on and sauce on the side are 2 different products, adding sauce afterward does not create the same chemical reaction. On my last visit I waited over 40 minutes for my food because they made a mistake in the back and gave my food to another customer. You can hear EVERY SINGLE THING they say in the back. I stood there and listened to them give my food away. Then give me cold fries after waiting 40 minutes while they are counting down to closing time an hour before close.

Finally the taste of the mild sauce and the season of the chicken is starting to vary wildly.

I have called and spoke to management before, they don't care. Check your order before you leave and make hope the "good" cook is on duty.

Original review :
This Harold's is exactly what you would get in the city. As good as 87th, made correctly unlike Hyde Park. Everything is seasoned and cooked perfectly. The wait is long because of COVID but they seem to be improving the process. They aren't taking call in orders which really sucks but I understand. This is probably the best thing to happen to Springfield in 2020. If you love Harold's, don't hesitate to visit.

Donโt go here! They will charge you $1.50 for extra mild sauce but donโt put any extra mild sauce on there. I ordered 10 wings with heavy mild sauce. 5 wings had some sauce on there and the others had NO sauce on there. The owner stated she will not refund my money because I didnโt call until the next morning or return the food. I didnโt get my food until almost 9 pm last night and called about it this morning AFTER I realize I was charged for extra sauce  that I didnโt receive.

The owned is getting over on customers over charging them maybe because sheโs in a financial hardship but that isnโt my fault nor concern. I will not be returning to this rip off restaurant and I will be getting my money BACK!

By far the best chicken wings Iโve had in Springfield, combined with the hot sauce and lemon pepper seasoning it made for a great lunch. The food was priced greatly as well. It was empty when I came and ordered which is a shame considering the quality of the food. The community should rally around spots like these before all weโre left with are McDonaldโs and burger kings on every corner.

I was craving some hometown food and found this Haroldโs. I went inside to order and the food was very reasonable but as I sat outside to wait on my food I started reading reviews, upon doing that I noticed a lot of comments of food not being hot which mines was hot, I seen reviews about chicken being dark fried to hard like it was in dirty grease and it definitely looked like it was fried in dirty grease. The catfish combo said 4 piece and Iโm thinking Iโm getting 4 pieces of fish and it was like 4 fish tenders and the fries was cooked hard and the sauce didnโt taste original. It was a total disappointment and I wouldnโt recommend going here. If youโre going to buy into a franchise at least try and keep up the quality of food to match with the name youโre using.

I went in tonight after a very long day. I must say many bad moments interrupted my day so I was pretty down going to get food for the family. Big John and Rico were very welcoming, professional and clean. I noticed John and Rico was their hands a few times and they had on masks. We enjoyed the food and I enjoyed the experience. Keep it up yโall. Itโs the little things that can make oneโs day/night just a little better.
Thank yโall. Oh yeah and the presentation of the foodโฆon point ๐๐ฟ

Actualizaciรณn de 5 estrellas a 2: Despuรฉs de casi 2 meses de funcionamiento, este restaurante se ha convertido en un tรญpico restaurante de Springfield. Sirven comida frรญa, entre un 50% y un 75% de pedidos incorrectos y un servicio al cliente inexistente. Ponen carne caliente sobre papas fritas frรญas. Constantemente no ponen salsa en los pedidos. La salsa que ponen y la que acompaรฑan son dos productos diferentes; aรฑadir salsa despuรฉs no crea la misma reacciรณn quรญmica. En mi รบltima visita, esperรฉ mรกs de 40 minutos por mi comida porque se equivocaron en la trastienda y se la dieron a otro cliente. Se puede oรญr todo lo que dicen en la trastienda. Me quedรฉ allรญ parado y escuchรฉ cรณmo regalaban mi comida. Luego me dieron papas fritas frรญas despuรฉs de esperar 40 minutos, mientras hacรญan la cuenta regresiva para el cierre una hora antes.

Finalmente, el sabor de la salsa suave y la sazรณn del pollo estรกn empezando a variar mucho.

Ya he llamado y hablado con la gerencia antes, pero no les importa. Revisa tu pedido antes de irte y asegรบrate de que el cocinero "bueno" estรฉ de servicio.

Reseรฑa original:
Este Harold's es exactamente lo que encontrarรญas en la ciudad. Tan bueno como el 87th, preparado correctamente, a diferencia de Hyde Park. Todo estรก sazonado y cocinado a la perfecciรณn. La espera es larga debido a la COVID, pero parece que estรกn mejorando el proceso. No aceptan pedidos por telรฉfono, lo cual es una verdadera lรกstima, pero lo entiendo. Probablemente sea lo mejor que le ha pasado a Springfield en 2020. Si te encanta Harold's, no dudes en visitarlo.

ยกNo vayan! Les cobran $1.50 por salsa extra suave, pero no les ponen salsa extra suave. Pedรญ 10 alitas con salsa muy suave. Cinco alitas tenรญan salsa y las demรกs no. La dueรฑa me dijo que no me reembolsarรญa el dinero porque no llamรฉ hasta la maรฑana siguiente ni devolvรญ la comida. No recibรญ mi comida hasta casi las 9 p. m. de anoche y llamรฉ esta maรฑana para avisarme despuรฉs de darme cuenta de que me habรญan cobrado salsa extra que no recibรญ.

La dueรฑa se estรก aprovechando de los clientes, quizรกs porque tiene dificultades econรณmicas, pero no es mi culpa ni me incumbe. ยกNo volverรฉ a este restaurante fraudulento y me devolverรกn mi dinero!

Sin duda, las mejores alitas de pollo que he probado en Springfield. Con la salsa picante y el aderezo de limรณn y pimienta, fue un almuerzo estupendo. Ademรกs, el precio era excelente. Estaba vacรญo cuando lleguรฉ y pedรญ, lo cual es una pena dada la calidad de la comida. La comunidad deberรญa apoyar lugares como este antes de que solo queden McDonald's y Burger King en cada esquina.

Tenรญa antojo de comida local y encontrรฉ este Harold's. Entrรฉ a pedir y la comida era muy razonable, pero mientras esperaba mi comida, comencรฉ a leer reseรฑas. Al hacerlo, notรฉ muchos comentarios sobre que la comida no estaba caliente, y la mรญa sรญ lo estaba. Vi reseรฑas sobre pollo frito muy duro como si estuviera en grasa sucia, y definitivamente parecรญa frito en grasa sucia. El combo de bagre decรญa 4 piezas y pensรฉ que pedirรญa 4 piezas de pescado, pero eran como 4 tiras de pescado, las papas fritas estaban duras y la salsa no sabรญa original. Fue una decepciรณn total y no recomendarรญa ir aquรญ. Si vas a comprar una franquicia, al menos intenta mantener la calidad de la comida para que coincida con el nombre que estรกs usando.

Fui esta noche despuรฉs de un dรญa muy largo. Debo decir que muchos malos momentos me interrumpieron el dรญa, asรญ que me sentรญa bastante desanimado al ir a comprar comida para la familia. Big John y Rico fueron muy amables, profesionales y limpios. Vi que John y Rico fueron sus manos varias veces y llevaban mascarillas. Disfrutamos de la comida y yo disfrutรฉ de la experiencia. ยกSigan asรญ! Son los pequeรฑos detalles los que pueden alegrar un dรญa o una noche un poco mejor.
Gracias a todos. Ah, sรญ, y la presentaciรณn de la comida... ยกperfecta! ๐๐ฟ

I-update ang 5 star sa 2: Pagkatapos ng halos 2 buwang operasyon ang restaurant na ito ay naging isang tipikal na Springfield restaurant. Naghahain ng malamig na pagkain, mga maling order sa rate na 50% hanggang 75% at hindi umiiral na serbisyo sa customer.  Naglagay sila ng mainit na karne sa ibabaw ng malamig na fries. Patuloy silang hindi naglalagay ng sarsa sa mga order. Ang sarsa at sarsa sa gilid ay 2 magkaibang produkto, ang pagdaragdag ng sarsa pagkatapos ay hindi lumilikha ng parehong kemikal na reaksyon. Sa huling pagbisita ko naghintay ako ng mahigit 40 minuto para sa aking pagkain dahil nagkamali sila sa likod at ibinigay ang aking pagkain sa ibang customer. Maririnig mo ang BAWAT SINGLE na sinasabi nila sa likod. Tumayo ako at nakinig sa kanila na binigay ang pagkain ko. Pagkatapos ay bigyan ako ng malamig na fries pagkatapos maghintay ng 40 minuto habang nagbibilang sila hanggang sa oras ng pagsasara isang oras bago magsara.

Sa wakas ang lasa ng banayad na sarsa at ang panahon ng manok ay nagsisimulang mag-iba nang husto.

Kanina pa ako tumawag at nakausap ng management, wala silang pakialam. Suriin ang iyong order bago ka umalis at umasa na ang "magaling" na tagapagluto ay naka-duty.

Orihinal na pagsusuri:
Itong Harold's ay eksakto kung ano ang makukuha mo sa lungsod. As good as 87th, ginawa nang tama hindi katulad ng Hyde Park. Lahat ay tinimplahan at ganap na niluto. Matagal ang paghihintay dahil sa COVID pero parang pinagbubuti nila ang proseso. Hindi sila tumatanggap ng mga tawag sa mga order na talagang nakakapagod ngunit naiintindihan ko. Ito marahil ang pinakamagandang bagay na mangyayari sa Springfield sa 2020. Kung mahilig ka sa Harold's, huwag mag-atubiling bumisita.

Huwag dito! Sisingilin ka nila ng $1.50 para sa extra mild sauce pero huwag kang maglagay ng extra mild sauce doon. Umorder ako ng 10 wings na may heavy mild sauce. Limang wings ang may sauce at ang iba ay WALANG sauce. Sinabi ng may-ari na hindi niya ibabalik ang pera ko dahil hindi ako tumawag hanggang kinabukasan o ibinalik ang pagkain. Hindi ko natanggap ang pagkain ko hanggang halos alas-9 ng gabi kagabi at tinawagan ko ito ngayong umaga MATAPOS kong mapansin na sinisingil ako para sa extrang sauce na hindi ko natanggap.

Nang-aasar ang may-ari sa mga customer dahil sa sobrang paniningil nila sa kanila, marahil dahil nahihirapan siya sa pera, pero hindi ko kasalanan o inaalala iyon. Hindi na ako babalik sa magnanakaw na restaurant na ito at babawiin ko ang pera ko!

Sa ngayon ang pinakamahusay na mga pakpak ng manok na mayroon ako sa Springfield, na sinamahan ng mainit na sarsa at lemon pepper seasoning na ginawa nito para sa isang mahusay na tanghalian. Malaki rin ang presyo ng pagkain. Walang laman nang dumating ako at nag-order na nakakahiya kung isasaalang-alang ang kalidad ng pagkain. Dapat mag-rally ang komunidad sa mga lugar na tulad nito bago ang lahat ng natitira sa atin ay McDonald's at burger king sa bawat sulok.

I was craving some hometown food and found this Harold's. Pumasok ako sa loob para mag-order at very reasonable naman ang pagkain pero habang nakaupo ako sa labas para maghintay sa pagkain ko nagsimula akong magbasa ng mga review, upon doing that I noticed a lot of comments of food not hot which mines is hot, I seen reviews about chicken being dark fried to hard na parang nasa dirty grease and it definitely looked like it was fried in dirty grease. Sabi ng catfish combo 4 piece and I'm thinking I'm getting 4 pieces of fish and it was like 4 fish tenders and the fries was cooked hard and the sauce didn't taste original. Ito ay isang kabuuang pagkabigo at hindi ko inirerekomenda ang pagpunta dito. Kung bibili ka sa isang prangkisa, subukan at panatilihing panatilihin ang kalidad ng pagkain upang tumugma sa pangalan na iyong ginagamit.

Pumasok ako ngayong gabi pagkatapos ng napakahabang araw. Dapat kong sabihin na maraming masamang sandali ang nakagambala sa aking araw kaya medyo down ako para kumuha ng pagkain para sa pamilya. Si Big John at Rico ay napaka-welcome, propesyonal at malinis. Napansin kong ilang beses na silang naka-maskara ni John at Rico. Nasiyahan kami sa pagkain at nasiyahan ako sa karanasan. Ipagpatuloy nyo lahat. Ito ang maliliit na bagay na maaaring magpaganda ng araw/gabi ng isang tao.
Salamat sa inyong lahat. Ay oo at ang pagtatanghal ng pagkainโฆsa punto ๐๐ฟ
